review:
! This review only refers to Steam Deck technical issues. To not be unfair, I rated "Recommended", as I can't say anything about the game(play) itself. 

I'm sorry, the game is unusable on Steam Deck, due to a weird mouse issue (mouse pointer movement restricted to 2/3 x 3/4 of screen width/height).

And it will only even run, using PROTON GE v8-32 or later. Plus setting an option in config dialogue window to "Run in window" (fullscreen, it won't even start).

Thus, I will have to refund. Unfortunately.

author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 548, 'last_played': 1705774275}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198957655713', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1678622010}
review:
Une très bonne surprise que ce premier volet! 
L'enquête tient en haleine, on est dans un point and click très classique qui plaira aux amateurs du genre. On mène une vraie investigation, on ne passe pas son temps en associations improbables d'objets qui plombent le scénario. L'animation  un peu "figée" donne l'impression d'un jeu "old school" qui m'a un peu rappelé Gabriel Knight. Et même si on ne joue pas dans la même cour, l'ensemble, quoiqu'un peu court, reste agréable.

author: {'steamid': '76561199383060114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 737, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 638, 'last_played': 1686578906}
review: Incuriosita dal Made in Italy, mi sono approcciata per la prima volta ad un genere che non avevo mai considerato prima. E devo dire che l'azzardo è stato vincente. Shadows on the Vatican ha tutto quello che un videogioco dovrebbe avere: una trama ben costruita, una meticolosa caratterizzazione dei personaggi, una dovizia di dettagli che non è tanto usuale ritrovare nel gaming e una soundtrack fenomenale. Assolutamente promosso a pieni voti!

author: {'steamid': '76561198249119632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1678634447}
review:
Un gioco con luci ed ombre ma che alla fine si fa godere.
Ho sin da subito apprezzato la grafica curatissima in stile fumetto, che con le sue cutscene ricorda molto lo stile di XIII.
Anche il comparto audio è ben realizzato, con delle musiche ben calate nell'atmosfera del gioco ed un doppiaggio sicuramente azzeccato per certi personaggi ma migliorabile per altri.
I dialoghi sono sensati e ben scritti e ho molto apprezzato certi stacchi ironici ( [spoiler] come il commento con relativo trofeo per il [i] bidet [/i] e certi dialoghi con Mario, il barista [/spoiler] )
E poi c'è la trama, altra nota positiva del prodotto, cresce al giusto ritmo e prende senza fare troppi giri logici.

Ma, come dicevo inizialmente, ci sono anche delle note dolenti.
La più grave fra queste è che certe sezioni davvero non si fanno comprendere ( [spoiler] un esempio: nella sezione finale, prima dovremmo usare delle chiavi per agganciarci ad un'impalcatura, senza alcun motivo, e poi dovremmo coprire con un telo un comignolo, anche in questo caso totalmente random poiché non si intende chiaramente che il volere del personaggio non è entrare direttamente in casa bensì far uscire da questa un personaggio chiave e solo dopo poter irrompere per commettere un furto... [/spoiler] ) o sono completamente arbitrarie ( [spoiler] come il minigioco dell'inseguimento con la macchina, in cui dovremmo scegliere delle strade su cui proseguire con il nostro veicolo, sperando di non incappare in ostacoli ma senza poterli minimamente prevedere in alcun modo [/spoiler] ).
Infine, sul lato tecnico c'è da fare del labor limae: in diverse sezioni il gioco, nell'angolo superiore sinistro, visualizza un codice di errore [code] "Runtime Script Error, see Log for details" [/code]ed in più i tempi di caricamento sono troppo lunghi per un'avventura così leggera.

In soldoni, se cercate un'avventura semplice al punto giusto, con una bella grafica fumettosa e di durata breve, provate [b] Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed [/b]; vi intratterrà sicuramente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150814810', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1675313321}
review:
This is a review of Shadows on the Vatican Acts I and II, as I find them inseparable. This series has quickly become my game of the year, even playing it after so long, and right on time before the release of Act III. What does such a late release mean? This is not an indication of laziness. Quite the contrary: that can mean only one thing. This is a work of love, of passion, of huge investment in time and resources because this story WANTS to be told, and HAS to be experienced. This is a story beloved to the producers and storytellers, so much so that they have battled many an obstacle in these years to make it happen. This is a game that wants ITS VOICE to be heard.
As you load the game and the title screen appears, you are treated to one of most sublime game soundtracks I have ever heard. I mean Lara Croft’s theme in the original Tomb Raider level of epic. The music in Shadows is simply jaw dropping. I have the full OST in my playlist and I often listen to it, alongside Hans Zimmer, Dan Gibson, Carmina, Bach. You can find the full OST on Youtube as well (and I recommend listening to the track "To Silvia"). 
Let’s talk about the story and dialogues.
Inspired by the essay "In nome di Dio", Shadows on the Vatican is a thrill-filled story full of intrigue, mystery and some of the most deep and memorable characters I have ever met in a video game. James Murphy and Silvia are well rounded and beautifully designed — seriously, the comics-style, hand drawn characters are heart-stopping beautiful — and they have a deep personality. The plot will capture you and drag you through the two acts, leaving you wanting for more. There are tons of historical facts, trivia about Rome, the Vatican… there is so much to learn!
One of the best parts of this game are the dialogues, the thoughts of the characters, their motivations, their shady past and uncertain future. Every character evolves through the story and I can’t wait to see where the next two acts will take us.
Puzzles and gameplay are classic, as one can expect from a point and click adventure game. There are inventory based puzzles, riddles, as well as some more difficult puzzles based on reading, numbers and deep thought. Some of them may be a tad too difficult, so don’t feel too bad if you have to check a walkthrough once or twice. It’s worth it! However, I also found some of the most fun, original and quirky puzzles as well, winking and giving a nod to typical cliches of point and click games and turning them around for the fun of it.
In this respect, there are TONS of easter eggs, funny achievements, references to the world of gaming, and to other games developed by other software houses.
In my opinion, the only reason why we don’t see a flood of overwhelmingly positive reviews is the fact that some players are reluctant to give it a chance before the four episodes come out. 
That is exactly the opposite of what we should do, as it is with our support NOW that can make a new act possible, that energies and budget can be allocated to the telling of this story.
Last but not least, let’s talk about the elephant in the room: the graphics. Not the comics-style drawings of the characters, but the 3D backgrounds and character models. Yes, the graphics is a bit rigid, and can feel outdated, even though it NEVER for a second bothered me or distracted me, and I actually find the backgrounds quite well detailed and well designed.
But we must keep this in mind: They were other times, there was no Kickstarter to bump up the budget of an indie company, there was no Steam to advertise, there was no indie trend, and the engines available were quite different.
I don’t want to hear it. Of course the graphics is a bit outdated. However, it shouldn’t affect or distract us too much, considering that we live in the era of masterpieces like Undertale and The Return of the Obra Dinn, purposefully reduced to bare bone graphics, for one reason or another. Whatever the case, we should be open-minded and accepting enough to give it a fair chance.
If you do it, you will be rewarded with amazing character designs, a jaw dropping soundtrack, memorable character, and a beautifully told story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071375554', 'num_games_owned': 2813, 'num_reviews': 401, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1682562254}
review:
This is the first game of the series Shadows on the Vatican, you play as James, an ex-priest who became a doctor after an incident in the 90s. At the present time, he received a phone call from his friend Cristoforo who was asking for help, little did he know that there were secrets about the church he didn't know and must discover in order to help his friend. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2929519693

The gameplay is like any classic Point&Click. I liked the portraits of the characters and the artwork of the comic cutscenes, however, the characters looked dated during the gameplay. The areas and scenery look great though.

The dialogue and voiceovers are good in my opinion, although I've read in some of the reviews stating how bad it is. The puzzles are easy, and if you fail to do anything the game has autosave as well as manual save. You can explore the city with the fast-traveling map.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2929519870

When you first play the game, you'll hear an outstanding theme song on the menu screen, I liked it so much, and the developers are nice enough to put the soundtrack on steam for free, I would pay to listen to this music. The soundtracks of the game are really good.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2929522691

Pros:
+Interesting story.
+Excellent writing.
+Interesting characters
+Beautiful soundtracks. (Especially the main menu theme)
+Good puzzles.
+Manual save.
+Steam achievements.

Cons:
-The game is quite short, there is even an achievement where you can finish the game in less than two hours.
-Dated characters look.

Some of the achievements are missable, but there are some good guides here on steam to earn them all if you are into getting 100%.  I highly recommend it to people who enjoy P&C games and don't mind the religious aspects. P.S. Mario is my favorite character.

[i]Other Reviews:[/i]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198071375554/recommended/378630/]Shadows on the Vatican - Act II: Wrath Review[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198004842640', 'num_games_owned': 1058, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1674070563}
review:
Mais uma recomendação não tão enfática. 

A trama desse adventure tem potencial, mas como o jogo é muito curtinho não cheguei a empolgar totalmente. O plot twist do final foi bem clichezão e batido, mas eu gosto muito de histórias de conspiração, então vou jogar os próximos, até porque já estão na minha biblioteca hehe. 

Visualmente o jogo é feio de doer, datado até para a época do lançamento. Eu me senti jogando algo do fim dos anos 90/início dos 2000. Cenários pré-renderizados pouco inspirados e personagens que se movem como robôs. A arte em estilo comics que aparece em certos trechos do jogo também não é sensacional. Trilha meh. 

Os puzzles são, no geral, bem elaborados (ainda que com um ou outro elemento batido) e uma coisa positiva é que não é um jogo que vai te puxando pela mãozinha e dizendo o que você tem que fazer ou para onde ir. Você tem que pensar. 

Pegue se sair numa promo muuuuuito baratinho, como eu peguei, e se você curtir muito esse tipo de jogo. Do contrário, não vale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344257675', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1671999991}
review:
Крутоны (гренки) луковые!

Луковые гренки (сухарики) отлично подходят для подачи к первым блюдам, особенно хороши крутоны к супам-пюре.

Продукты:

Хлеб бездрожжевой или французский (резаный кубиками 1 см) - 6 стаканов (примерно 180 г)
Масло сливочное (растопленное) - 1 ст. л.
Паприка - 1 ч. л.
Луковый порошок - 1 ч. л.
	
1. Включить духовку для предварительного разогрева до 180 градусов.

2. В большом противне с высокими бортиками смешать кубики хлеба, с маслом, паприкой и луковым порошком.

3. Поместить противень в разогретую духовку и жарить крутоны около 20 минут, единожды помешав.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995498126', 'num_games_owned': 2373, 'num_reviews': 668, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1653247813}
review:
Gut gemachtes Adventure.

Hat mir gut gefallen.
Ist auf jeden Fall was für jeden, der Kriminalgeschichten und Verschwörungstheorien liebt.
Werde gleich danach mit Akt 2 von insgesamt 4 weitermachen.
Hoffentlich kommen die letzten beiden Akte auch noch auf den Markt, wegen Corona war jetzt viel Leerlaufzeit.
Daher wäre es schön, wenn sich noch ein paar Käufer (im Sale) finden lassen würden, um das auch finanziell hinzubekommen.
Sehr schön ist, es gibt nicht nur Sammelkarten, sondern auch interessante Errungenschaften.
Wer sinnvolle Speicherstände anlegt, kann die speziellen davon auch noch nachträglich hinbekommen.
So muss man z.B. die Systemuhr auf Weihnachten stellen, und dann den Schornstein am Ende des Spiels benutzen.
Eins bekommt man nur, indem man in unter 2 Stunden erneut das Spiel durchspielt, ich habe 45 Minuten dafür gebraucht, danach hatte ich den 100% Spielstand.
Da wäre alternativ auch noch genug Zeit, um dann eine andere Errungenschaft mitzunehmen, die man nicht per Speicherstand schnell erreichen kann.
Es ist also eine noch akzeptable Mischung, damit auch ein kleiner Anspruch besteht.
Ich hatte einmal im Spiel einen Absturz, was aber auch an meiner 2 Monitorlösung mit unterschiedlichen Auflösungen und dem hinausklicken fürs nachlesen der nächsten Errungenschaften gelegen haben könnte.
Ansonsten war alles super und ich hatte viel Freude am Spiel, da die Story interessant und die Rätsel nicht zu schwer waren.

Fazit: kaufen, kaufen, kaufen!

author: {'steamid': '76561198304856412', 'num_games_owned': 3250, 'num_reviews': 1570, 'playtime_forever': 1307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1307, 'last_played': 1684964202}
review: Une histoire intéressante et une expérience de jeu tout à fait correcte

author: {'steamid': '76561198078495456', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 256, 'last_played': 1651185639}
review:
Consigliatissimo primo episodio di una saga piacevole e ben fatta, che sa rispettare perfettamente i canoni del genere, senza abbandonarsi a frequenti citazioni stantie. 
Opera davvero di ottimo livello professionale, curata in maniera capillare nonostante figlia di una produzione indipendente. Intrattenitiva e mai frustrante, seria ma mai pesante. 
Personaggi e avvenimenti memorabili e credibili, buoni enigmi e musica ben realizzata. Buono il doppiaggio sia in italiano che in inglese.  Davvero buono, aspetto con ansia di poter proseguire la saga :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198111946226', 'num_games_owned': 227, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1658774338}
review: adoro esse tipo de jogo!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007981462', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1649543829}
review:
While a bit on the short side, this first act is a great setup for an investigation adventure involving thugs, the Vatican and money laundry. All characters are absolutely well defined with distinct personalities, something that you don't see very often. And there is the best side-kick character introduction ever seen in a P&C game.

Puzzles are generally well designed (with a few exceptions), but some of them really rely on the player examining every single hot spot with both left and right mouse buttons. 

Overall, I recommend this game to every one who likes investigative P&C games and conspiracies heavy stories.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164831891', 'num_games_owned': 794, 'num_reviews': 785, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1646571794}
review: Olha, eu tenho minhas críticas em relação a jogos lançados em episódios, já que cada parte da história tende a demorar muito para lançar e o valor total pago tende a ser elevado. De qualquer forma, é um jogo curto (levei cerca de 1h para completar todas as conquistas) e a 90% off acredito que valha a pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082153748', 'num_games_owned': 50, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 357, 'last_played': 1636744646}
review: Bella avventura grafica "classica" con una storia intrigante ben scritta e enigmi logici e integrati con la trama. Consigliato (cosi come il resto della serie).

author: {'steamid': '76561198157234021', 'num_games_owned': 876, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 441, 'last_played': 1641311026}
review:
Pleasantly surprised by this game, looking forward to continue with ACTII and I've seen on Twitter that devs work on ACTS III/IV which is great.

There are some rough areas like for example stiff character models and missing signposting at times, but i can overlook these as i am a sucker for such kind of point and clicks with conspiracies etc.

Keep it up guys, greetings to Italy from Greece.
developer_response: Thank you for your review! After Act II, don't forget to play Nightingale, a very important mini-episode linked to the series. Let us know what you think about it! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197986657824', 'num_games_owned': 984, 'num_reviews': 229, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1637455870}
review:
Interesante propuesta indie que no ha acabado de engancharme. La forma de anticiparte la trama parece demasiado forzada o que te llega de sopetón, así como algunos giros o introducciones de personajes. Los puzzles no me parecen para nada complicados y los subtítulos en castellano tienen algunas faltas de ortografía bastante importantes.

Los gráficos, si bien no es la parte más importante, son bastante cutres y el juego no parece demasiado bien optimizado. El tema de que sea por capítulos, pues echar para atrás al quedarse la historia incompleta y no saber si terminará. La descripción de los personajes parece, por momentos, algo superficial, al destacar tanto que son muy atractivos (¿es realmente necesario?).

En fin, no me ha acabado de enganchar lo suficiente, aunque le daré una oportunidad a la segunda parte ya que se juega fácil y su duración no es demasiado larga. Logros fáciles de conseguir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120002431', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1633467740}
review:
Неплохой квест, хотя я и не фанат данного жанра... Короткая, но интригующая история... И это только 1 акт!!! Обрывается все на самом интересном, логическое завершение будет далее...

Также есть классные и простые ачивки... Без особого труда выбил 90% или 18 из 20, мне просто лень менять дату и заново прощелкивать фастран)) А так 100% будет получить не так уж и сложно!!! Также есть карточки и значки!

За полную цену я бы брать не стал, но по скидке ~90% можно и прихватить!

author: {'steamid': '76561199083925377', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1627429913}
review:
Visitando Roma de Chicago, onde trabalha como médico, o ex-sacerdote James Murphy atende a um misterioso pedido de ajuda de seu amigo Cristoforo. O desaparecimento de uma pasta contendo documentos comprometedores convence James de que seu amigo é vítima de algo sinistro. O envolvimento do Vaticano inspira James a chegar ao fundo deste mistério. Ao longo deste caminho perigoso e perturbador, James encontra o companheiro de viagem mais improvável que questionará suas crenças mais profundas. E assim os dois personagens começam tanto uma jornada física em busca da verdade, quanto uma exploração metafísica da alma interior e dos segredos mais sombrios que todos escondem, até mesmo um "campeão da fé" como James. Roma é o palco desta aventura, uma cidade banhada pelo crepúsculo eterno, seus céus tingidos da cor do sangue derramado em mais de trinta anos de intriga: sangue de inocentes e culpados, de vítimas desconhecidas e famosas.
Este jogo possui uma boa trama, amei a história e a forma de como conseguiu mesclar a investigação com a religião com enigma bem misterioso que quando descobrido se profunde numa área sombria o que o faz querer saber mais da próxima sequência. Curti demais os puzzles e o modo da conversação, possui um entretenimento bem legal e não é cansativo o jogo até o fim. Talvez o que possa o incomodar são as movimentações do personagem andando, etc, mas não chega a dá vontade de parar de jogar (pelo amor de Deus). Os gráficos, cenários, principalmente a área dos comic meio graphic novel que rola em uns momentos nos cenários do jogo achei muito da hora.
Todos os personagens foram bem equilibrados e bem úteis para a história ao todo, os cut scenes com as tramas prende a atenção desde o início do jogo até ao fim do episódio e cada locais que podemos ir no jogo possui uma história por trás sendo ela histórica ou não mescla muito bem no que o jogo propôs para o desenrolamento do enigma do Act I. Eu só sei que amei e recomendo muito ele, sendo uns dos meus favs agora.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078996445', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 263, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1625103382}
review: Yet another incomplete, abandoned episodic game that died before there was much of any story development.  This first episode is a very short (there's an achievement for finishing in less than 2 hours that I got without even trying to especially) and very mediocre P&C adventure game in any case that hardly even gets the abandoned storyline started.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106507444', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1621565025}
review:
Lead voice actors are awful. Especially Silvia. She speaks too slowly in her voiceovers and is clearly reading her lines rather than acting them. She strikes me as the type who doesn't understand the difference between reading a scene and acting a scene. They probably told her over and over to put a bit of emotion into her acting but she figured since she was reading from a script, she should sound like she's reading. Godawful.

Puzzles in this game are mainly inventory puzzles, but very few of them make sense. Half the time I have no idea why I'm doing something. Hero is stuck hanging from a scaffold and he uses keys to pull himself up? Um, not only would that never work in real life, but it doesn't make any logical sense. The other annoyance is how linear the game is. You aren't allowed to do things unless the game decides it's time to do them. Hero will say over and over that something doesn't make sense until he finally decides it does. I spent the first hour listening to him refuse to do anything. Why would I do that? Um because I'm telling you to that's why!

 This game isn't exactly horrible. It just suffers from poor acting and illogical puzzles. Visually it looks great and the gameplay and controls are everything you'd want in an adventure game.  I've heard the second game is better. Here's hoping.

author: {'steamid': '76561199124790750', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1619825680}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025823574', 'num_games_owned': 3339, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1671892663}
review:
Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed is a short point and click adventure game - the game has an achievement for a sub-2 hour run (I made it to 50 minutes with mistakes), and Howlongtobeat lists the game as 2.5 hours long - it's not a major title.


First and foremost: 
- the game's animation is lacking

- the protagonist's (James') English voice acting is excellent for most of the game, but supporting character's VO is like a rollercoaster. Mario is great, the nun's mixed, Silvia's flat and it sounds like the voice actress just didn't even care.

- The story is loosely based on the 1984 book of  David A. Yallop:  In God's Name. It's like the first (few?) chapters of any Dan Brown book, but the programming is not so tight and there's surprisingly little gameplay/puzzle in the game.

I genuinely liked the game because it has character and I found it charming even with the silly animation style, and I found the story interested. So my review is positive, but as I mentioned the problems - it's not a flashed out and fancy game. Being at the current 68% review rate with mixed category is fitting for its overall quality, there are glaring issues that need to be overlooked to fully enjoy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151458904', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1607362121}
review: Un gioco abbastanza squallido, mal doppiato, mal disegnato e abbastanza scontato. Cosa ancora più grave, i numerosi luoghi comuni sui romani e gli italiani. la sciarpa in bella vista "magica Roma" dove il barista  "romano" parla napoletano, dipinge roma come una città di scippatori, tutto discriminante e superficiale. Sviluppatori e tutta la combriccola che ha messo in piedi questo gioco assai scarso hanno molto da imparare sul modo di fare videogames senza discriminare fedi sportive o provenienze geografiche e devo imparare a fare storie coinvolgenti

author: {'steamid': '76561198050016554', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 517, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1605761505}
review:
Je suis un peu embêté avec cet acte 1 de Shadows of Vatican. Je n'ai pas vraiment apprécié maiis l'acte 2 s'est révélé bien plus à mon goût. J'aurais tendance à évaluer négativement le 1 et positivement le 2 mais le 2 étant à peu près incompréhensible sans avoir fait le 1, ça n'a pas trop de sens de juger l'un sans l'autre. 
Bon, de quoi il retourne. On a affaire à un point&click classique, du type je me ballade un peu partout en papotant et en ramassant des trucs. Cet acte 1 nous propose une intrigue bien menée mais somme toute banale et assez prévisible. Le personnage principal est sous-exploité. L'intro nous montre un traumatisme passé mais les fêlures résultantes du perso ne seront sensibles qu'à l'acte 2. Les personnages secondaires de cet acte 1 ne sont pour la plupart pas partie prenante de l'intrigue. Le barman, la bibliothécaire, la banquière sont plus dédiés au pittoresque et à un humour basé sur une opposition de clichés "ritals" vs "ricains". Sur ce plan aussi, l'acte 2 est très différent avec des personnages importants pour l'intrigue.
Bref cet acte 1 n'est qu'une longue intro loin d'être palpitante.
Personnellement j'ai trouvé les enchaînements parfois peu fluides, par exemple devoir aller explicitement regarder un objet dans mon inventaire sans que ça ne dise rien de plus que quand je l'avais regardé sur son étagère avant de le prendre ou re-rentrer dans un lieu dont j'ai tout épuisé pour débloquer une cinématique, une action ou un dialogue. Encore un point qui m'a paru moins sensible dans l'acte 2.
Conclusion je vais finalement mettre un avis négatif parce qu'au vu des dates de parution des actes 1 et 2 et l'état du site officiel du jeu, j'ai bien l'impression que les actes 3 et 4 ne verront jamais le jour. L'acte 2 à lui seul ne me sauve pas l'ensemble

author: {'steamid': '76561197969138408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1565469370}

review: Shadows on the Vatican is a good, all-around adventure game.  It is short, but well made.  New locations open up as you progress in the story. You find things, talk to people, using logic and problem solving to try and figure out who tried to kill your friend.  Surprise ending. Maybe the developers will make new chapters?

author: {'steamid': '76561198024464262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1597590962}
review:
Herkese Merhaba,

Oyun 2014 yapımı ve bir serinin ilk oyunu. Bu ilk bölümün 2.5-3 saatlik oynama süresi mevcut. 
Konu olarak tatmin edici diyebiliriz. Grafikler açıkçası orta seviyenin biraz aşağısında. Yani eğer  bu tip oyunlardan görsel şölen bekleyenlerdenseniz hayal kırıklığına uğrarsınız. Mekan grafikleri kişi grafiklerine göre biraz daha iyi durumda. Tabi bu eleştiriyi yaparken oyunun 2014 yapımı ( 6 yaşında ) bir oyun olduğunu unutmamak gerekli. Bu yüzden çok fazla acımasız davranmak istemiyorum. 
Bulmacalar anlamında neredeyse hiç zorlanmadım diyebilirim. Oyunun en büyük eksiği mekanlarda etkileşime gireceğiniz objelerin kısıtlı olması. Sadece işlem yapacağınız objeler ile etkileşim olduğundan ne yapacağınızı çok aramanız gerekmiyor. 

Oyunu 1,5 TL gibi bir paraya aldığım için tavsiye ediyorum. Bu fiyat seviyesinde 3 saat size sıkılmadığınız bir deneyim sunabiliyorsa bence belli bir başarım elde etmiştir. 

Hikayenin devamını merak ettiğim ve fiyatı da gayet uygun olduğu için ikinci bölümü de mutlaka oynayacağım diyebilirim. 

Para-Performans kıyası sayesinde oynanabilir olduğunu düşünüyorum. Ama ileride hatırlayacağım ve çok iyi vakit geçirmiştim diyeceğim bir yapım kesinlikle değil. 

Yinede emeği geçenlere teşekkürler. Daha iyi yapımlara imza atmaları dileğiyle. 

İyi eğlenceler.
R.Serdar Sağbil

author: {'steamid': '76561198013146396', 'num_games_owned': 1655, 'num_reviews': 2129, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1596511314}
review:
Ой, не...

Графика из "Детей против волшебников", как и анимация.

Игра не видит нормальную видеокарту - только встроенную. Оттого и тормозит.

Да и убедился в очередной раз, что не люблю такие медленные скучные Point'n'Click.

Не рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012473463', 'num_games_owned': 4077, 'num_reviews': 418, 'playtime_forever': 524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1591752765}
review:
[h1]Follow our [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/36214917/]Curator Group for more reviews[/url][/h1]
Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed is the first act of a planned 4 part series. It wound up only getting 2 games before being canceled, and honestly, it was for good reasons. This game has far too many flaws to get 3 sequels. Voice acting is the most obvious issue as it takes what was intended as an extremely serious story and makes it almost comical. Characters either sound wooden and emotionless or they sound like cartoonish caricatures. The plot itself isn't terrible, but is full of cliches. Within the first 5 minutes, a character calls you and says "something crazy has happened, I can't explain over the phone, come to my apartment quickly". It is such an obvious setup for a character death that you start to think he isn't dead because there's no way a professional writer could write something so bad. The point and click gameplay is generic and does little to alleviate any of the crushing boredom. One of the worst parts about trying to recommend this game is that even for the occasional person who likes this game, the story ends after 2 games, so you can't even get closure if you are a fan. Overall, just another poorly executed adventure game that isn't worth playing.

2/10
[quote]
Visit our [url=https://www.mmmreviews.com]website[/url] for more in-depth reviews and recommendations
[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198990784417', 'num_games_owned': 564, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 488, 'last_played': 1589651369}
review:
[h1] Verschwörung im Vatikan [/h1]

[b] Geschichte: [/b]       
Wir spielen den Amerikaner James Murphy, einen Schönling der Arzt ist und zuvor als Priester tätig war. Sein ehemaliger Priesterkollege und Freund Christoforo bittet James um Hilfe, da er in Schwierigkeiten steckt. Im Vatican gehen scheinbar undurchsichtige Dinge vor sich. Hat Christoforo Entdeckungen gemacht, die für ihn besser unentdeckt geblieben wären? Was spielt sich dort ab und wer sind die involvierten Personen, die dahinterstecken? Um was geht es, um Macht, um Geldwäsche und hat sogar die Mafia ihre Finger im Spiel? James versucht diesem Mysterium auf den Grund zu gehen und seinem Freund zu helfen. Er fängt an in Rom zu recherchieren... 

[b] Realer Hintergrund: [/b]       
Das Vermögen der Vatikanbank IOR liegt schätzungsweise bei mehreren Milliarden Euro. Rund um die Vatikanbank gab es schon so einige Skandale und den Verdacht auf Unregelmäßigkeiten. Das Institut wurde in der Vergangenheit wegen der mangelnden Transparenz seiner Bilanzen mit Geldwäsche, Steuerhinterziehung, unsauberen Immobiliengeschäften und der Mafia in Verbindung gebracht. 1982 starb der Vorstand der Vatikanbank Roberto Calvi. Er wurde erhängt an einer Brücke aufgefunden. Ob es Selbstmord oder Mord war ist nicht ganz klar. Seitdem ranken sich Gerüchte um den Tod des Bankiers. Calvi wickelte wohl schmutzige Geschäfte für den Vatikan und die Mafia ab und starb vermutlich, weil er zu viel wusste. 

[b] Grafik und Ton: [/b]       
Warum wurde der teilweise ansprechende Comic-Stil nicht konsequent im ganzen Spiel umgesetzt? In den Zwischensequenzen gibt es einen Comic-Look. In Dialogen werden die Charaktere ebenfalls als Comic-Figuren dargestellt. Dieser restliche "2,5 D Look", mit den Hintergründen und Figuren wirkt einfach nur unpassend und hässlich. Die Figuren bewegen sich auch ganz seltsam steif und ungelenkig. Wenn eine Figur z.B. einen Gegenstand aufhebt, muss man ihr die Daumen drücken, dass sie sich dabei nicht die Knochen bricht. Dem Spiel hätte ein durchgängiger Comic-Look wie z.B. bei Baphomets Fluch 1, 2 oder 5 deutlich besser gestanden. 

Es gibt eine englische Sprachausgabe und deutsche Untertitel. Die Untertitel sind soweit okay und weisen keine großen Fehler auf. Die Musik bzw. der Soundtrack sind gut. Der Song beim Abspann gefällt mir. 

[b] Rätseldesigne: [/b]       
Das Rätseldesigne bietet mehr Schatten als Licht. Es wirkt teilweise sogar verunglückt und nicht immer logisch. 

Eine sehr strikte Linearität und teilweise sehr eingegrenzte Wahlmöglichkeit, wirken hier sogar störend. Man muss genau das, in der Reihenfolge erledigen, wie es die Entwickler vorgeben. Das führt an manchen Stellen zu stumpfen ausprobieren aller Möglichkeiten. Egal wie logisch und sinnvoll das nun erscheint. Das geht deutlich besser. Entweder mit alternativen Lösungsmöglichkeiten, oder besseren Hinweisen und mehr Flexibilität in welcher Reihenfolge eine Aufgabe / ein Rätsel gelöst wird. 

Durch das suboptimale Rätseldesigne und der starken Linearität raubt man auch der Geschichte seine Dynamik und verhindert, dass mehr Spannung aufkommt. Durch eine geschicktere Erzählweise könnte das Spiel durchaus Spannung erzeugen. Potential wäre da gewesen. 

[b] Fazit: [/b]  
Es wäre durchaus Potential für ein richtig gutes und unterhaltsames Adventure vorhanden gewesen. Wer über die zuvor genannten Mängel hinwegsehen kann, sollte einen Blick riskieren. Für mich ist es ein Durchschnitts-Adventure mit störenden Mängeln, was ich in seiner jetzigen Version nicht empfehlen kann. 

[b] Bewertung:[/b]  57 %

author: {'steamid': '76561198067038019', 'num_games_owned': 1218, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1444424019}
review:
[b]«Гнётся раб пред Божьей силой,
Но включён экран и - ша:
Вместо «Господи помилуй!»
«Шай-бу!» требует душа»[/b]

[u][i]© Александр Сидман[/i][/u]

[h1]«Великая Блудница»[/h1]

Великая Блудница, упиваясь всласть,
Вечно утопала в собственном пороке.
Она владела золотом и имела власть,
Однако, смерть её ждала в итоге.

Великая Блудника – Церковь Божья,
Свой болт на Господа хотела класть,
Исключительно торговала ложью,
Поддержав Коммерцию и Власть.

Власть принимала о войне решение,
Финансировала Коммерция войну,
А Церковь, дав своё благословение,
Ввергала добрых христиан во тьму.

Опьянённая вином из крови́ людей,
Носила украшения из злата и сапфира.
Искала оправдание жестокости царей
И приносила прибыль для банкира.

Но прерван был её задорный смех,
Теперь Блудница предана забвению,
А банкиры и цари, с ней знавшие успех,
Лишь на труп её глядели с сожалением.

review:
Quem entende um pouco mais de inglês ira gostar deste game, digo isso por que o que faz avançar no game é a história e infelizmente ele esta totalmente em inglês.

Ele tem sérios problemas de movimentos e na coleta de itens e isso irrita pra cacete @.@
Faz você pensar, por que to tentando zerar essa merda se tenho outro game melhor.

Mais calma que a história compensa.
Achei algumas semelhanças com o Constantine, e algumas outras referências de filmes. 
É um game baratinho e que vai durar ai umas 3 a 4 horas de gameplay, mais com paciência talvez você consiga tirar proveito de um game que você não da nada por ele.

author: {'steamid': '76561198391214389', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1575509064}
review:
Bien cómo lo dice su título, una historia que perfectamente podría asemejarse a la realidad sobre fraudes, lavado de dinero y otros delitos mezclados con la religión.
Tiene varios aspectos muy positivos pero la historia que tiene es muy buena, atrapándome desde el principio donde cada paso que das, cada descubrimento que haces te hace solo querer seguir avanzando para ver que es lo siguiente que le pasará a nuestro amigo y nosotros mismos. Su apartado visual es también muy bueno, si bien no he jugado demasiadas aventuras gráficas hasta el momento, ésta sin duda que es la que más me gustó en ese apartado, la banda sonora un poco por debajo pero aceptable. Su principal problema está en la traducción, ya que hay partes en los diálogos que están o bugeadas o mal hechas pero igual se entiende lo que se quiere decir. Es una historia bastante corta pero hay que tener en cuenta que hay una segunda parte, no es esa típica aventura que tienes que tener la guía en mano, es bastante entendible, no fácil, no. 
He quedado muy contento con la primera parte así que lo recomiendo obviamente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106512564', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1565482776}
review:
BottomLine at the Top:  A 3D 3rd person perspective P&C with decent art design and game play features, but also a story that I just couldn't get invested in.  Ultimately, it felt boring.  


-------------------------------------
Pros
-------------------------------------
-That main menu music is epic.  Reminds me of the menu from Phantasmagoria.
-Crisp art style with well-polished background/room design.  It’s kind of like a slick Gabriel Knight 3.
-Quality of life features: Double click run and fast travel to exit/enter new scene, autosaves, lots of save slots, spacebar highlight function.
-An interesting feature is the 3d directional audio in this game.  If your character is on one side of the screen his voice sounds like he is on that side and if he moves to the other the sound follows.  More noticeable on headphones.  It's a nice touch that gives a sense of immersion in the game.


-------------------------------------
Meh.
-------------------------------------
-Transition from dialogue to regaining mouse control is a second or two longer than I liked.
-Sprite animations are not graceful.  Things like picking up objects or sneaking around are awkward looking.
-There is an achievement called dialogue skipper that you get if you finish the game in less than 2 hours.  I found it kind of ironic as I did end up clicking through a lot of the dialogue because I just didn't find it enjoyable.  I wasn't sure if they thought a lot of people would be doing this or if they were actively encouraging people to skip dialogue but its strange either way. 


-------------------------------------
Cons
-------------------------------------
-Puzzles are non-intuitive.
-Main character isn't exactly a barrel of laughs.  Voice actor is decent, but I wasn't finding myself connecting with the character.  If you can't connect with the character you don't really get invested in the story.
-And the story.  It seems well researched, as it was inspired by a book written about a real-life church financial conspiracy.  But I just couldn’t get interested in it some reason.  The pacing felt to slow.  
-Car chase mini game is boring, long and unnecessary.  It has a decision tree with 11 choices that you must get right perfectly or else it restarts every time.  Should have come with a skip sequence as I was immediately not interested in trying to complete it.
-Silvia's voice acting at the end is atrocious.
-When in the final scene, I went to save my game it crashed, and I had to reload.


Interestingly I was playing this at the same time as Broken Sword I Director's Cut.  It was jarring to go from BSI to this game and back again.  This game, although similar in theme, is just so much “heavier”.  An adventure game like this should be engaging with its DaVinci Code-esque church mystery conspiracy theme.  Instead it felt like work to get through.  I ended up going to other unplayed p&c games in my library which I think gives a pretty good indication as to how much I wanted to play through this story.  Reading through the other reviews it seems that there were more game breaking bugs but except for the last scene issue I described earlier it was mostly stable for me.  As it is a mostly stable game with good art design, quality of life features and an intuitive interface I would say that there is a good foundation for an enjoyable game here.  Ultimately though, the story pacing felt slow and I just could not connect with the main character.  
At $7 for 3 hours of game play, considering the issues listed above, this title is not worth it in my opinion.  However, it is currently 90% off.  At that price if you are a hardcore P&C gamer, I would say you can check it out and let me know what you think.  I received a review copy from the developer, and I would like to thank for giving me the opportunity to try out this title.  The second act has been out for a while now and they will soon be releasing the 3rd.  I am curious to see if the story picks up more in these subsequent entries but, after playing this first act, not so much that I am rushing to pick them up.

[hr][/hr]

author: {'steamid': '76561198164016063', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 333, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1563518564}
review:
pros

+ great looking pre rendered background graphics
+ when you click to space, hotspots is highlighted. No need to hunt for pixels.
+ interesting and some funny cast of characters
+ da vinci code type conspirancy story interesting
+ mostly enjoyable puzzles. there are also inventory puzzles you can combine some items
+ comic magazine style cut scenes looks good

cons

- low frame rate
- some bad voice acting
- slow gameplay
- slow animations
- too much loading screens
- game is short and episodic. it concluded with a cliff hanger.

overall this is an intriguing and fun to play point n click game but unfortunately game is episodic and first episode pretty short but i liked the game and i intend to buy and play another episodes too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037839153', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 297, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1422795368}
review:
[h1]RECENZJA RETROSPEKCYJNA[/h1]

[b]Zderzenie trzech stylów[/b]
Grę przygodową typu "wskaż i kliknij" twórcy postanowili zaprezentować mieszając trzy style: komiks - odpowiada za przedstawienie akcji w grze i rozmów, rysowane sceny - przedstawiają miejsca prowadzonych działań i obiekty 3D - postacie w grze. Obrazy komiksowe są w porządku, sceny również niczego sobie ale postacie 3D są tragiczne. Nie dość że wykonywane przez nich ruchy są sztywne i nieraz komiczne (np. podniesienie książki w banku) to jeszcze pływają po scenie a ich cień zupełnie nie odzwierciedla oświetlenia jakie w scenie panuje co psuje odbiór którego świetne udźwiękowienie nie jest w stanie poprawić.
[b]Mechaniki zmiany[/b]
Żeby gra niebyła zbyt monotonna w tym akcie dochodzi do dwóch zmian prowadzenia akcji i oba zupełnie niezrozumiałe i zdecydowanie niepotrzebne. Pierwsze to śledzenie. Dostajemy "zasmogowaną" mapkę miasta i dwa ruchome pojazdy. Pierw porusza się śledzony w taki sposób że chowa się pod smog po czym my dojeżdżając do granicy smogu musimy wybrać jeden z dwóch kierunków. Niema żadnych możliwości przejść ten etap logicznie a to rzutuje mocno na cały tytuł. Rozumiem jakbyśmy dostali mapkę na początku a ona by się "zamgliła" ale tak to jest po prostu bez sensu. Druga zmiana to koniec aktu i zmiana prowadzonej postaci. Po co twórcy wcisnęli nam osobę o której zupełnie nic nie wiemy i dlaczego mieliśmy zrobić to co musieliśmy, skoro w akcji dalej pierwszy bohater występował? Nie wiem ale wiem że ten zabieg skutecznie rozerwał zawiązującą się więź z James'em.
[b]Dość oczekiwań[/b]
Kiedyś całość wypuszczona by była jako jedna gra (wszystkie akty na raz) a tak Shadows on the Vatican to "never ending story". Całość ma mieć 4 akty ale skoro Akt.II wyszedł w 2015 a pierwszy obraz z Akt.III pokazano dopiero w tym roku to nie warto się nad tym tytułem pochylać. Tego typu gier jest mnóstwo i stworzenie odpowiednich grafik i osadzenie w nich pojedynczej (aczkolwiek wielowarstwowej) historii na prawdę nie wymaga aż tyle czasu nawet gdyby miało ją robić 3 amatorów ledwo po skończonych studiach. Przykro mi ale nie można polecić czegoś takiego tym bardziej że czas potrzebny na przebrnięcie przez jeden akt to ok. 2 godz. (połowa czasu schodzi na rozmowach) a jak się wie co i jak to nawet godziny nie trzeba.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129910589', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 220, 'last_played': 1692127332}
review: Un ottimo primo capitolo. Storia molto intrigante, dialoghi ben scritti e disegni davvero stupendi. Unica pecca, il 3D che non rende molto in una storia di questo tipo, ma non è un problema. Le musiche sono ben curate, così anche come l'atmosfera che si crea mentre si prosegue con le indagini. I personaggi sono ben delineati fin da subito, e non mancheranno attimi di tensioni e scenette comiche scritte con passione. Nel complesso, un ottimo gioco italiano (anche se consiglio di giocarlo in lingua inglese con i sottotitoli in italiano), vediamo come procederà la storia con l'Atto II !

author: {'steamid': '76561198804771271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1556816622}
review: Lo trovo valido,la grafica è carina,gli enigmi pure... lo consiglio se scontato soprattutto. Il doppiaggio italiano è davvero terribile però,e fa calare molto di qualità questo gioco che può essere considerato il "Broken Sword" italiano.

author: {'steamid': '76561198284658626', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 259, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1556203774}
review:
ocena:6/10
Shadows on the Vatican Act I to gra luźno oparta na książce ,,In the God name''. Podczas rozgrywki pokierujemy byłym księdzem Jamesem (nadal wierzącym w Boga). Będzie się on chciał dowiedzieć prawdy o swoim mentorze i tym co wydarzyło się podczas jego śmierci. Gra jest pełna intryg, ale w pełni objawia się to w Act II. Fabułę oceniam raczej pozytywnie. Rozgrywka to raczej proste zagadki i są tu fajnie zrobione. Tym na co szczególnie zwróciłem uwagę są fajnie zdubbingowe i ciekawe postacie oraz komiksowa oprawa w przerywnikach. Wadą gry może być oprawa w samej grze, jest ona średnia.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992694498', 'num_games_owned': 2769, 'num_reviews': 450, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1555409791}
review:
[h1]Trashtastic game[/h1]

I don't usually write reviews for games i completely dislike, only when they're broken to the degree of unplayable to warn other people or they have potential and are good at its core. This game is goes nicely into a first option.

Gameplay is a traditional point&click but it feels clunky. Animations are slow and characters look really bad. Voice acting is bad too and sometimes the voice disappears. And there's a game breaking bug. When you reach a certain point in the story the game crashes and gives error about failing to load some .png. But this is not the "best" part yet. I've tried to change the graphics settings and see how it goes. It seems that when you put the game in windowed mode the saves disappear. When you put it back into fullscreen they reappear. Seriously what the fuck?! How on earth did they managed to do that? On top of all that after i've tried to solve the issue steam overlay disappeared. The game broken and unfinished.
I tried to run it the next day and it didn't crash anymore so i finished it. Nevertheless developers know about the bug because from steam discussions. i'm not the only one who encountered it and they still didn't look into this issue and let it solve by itself. 

I'm thinking what good to say about this game. And it's hard to think about a single good thing it has. Maybe story is not bad, but it's only act one and it ends on a cliffhanger.

It should be free or at least much cheaper and include both episodes for the same price.
Avoid this broken game, it's no good. It has some potential but to be enjoyable it should be completely redone.

[b]Pros[/b]
[list]
[*]Story has some potential
[/list]
[b]Cons[/b]
[list]
[*]Terrible voiceacting
[*]Terrible graphics
[*]Annoying animations
[*]Long loading times
[*]Game breaking bug
[/list]

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32930811-Kosmos%27s-Cosmic-reviews/?appid=704030][h1]My curator page[/h1][/url]
developer_response:
Hi, 
we understand your frustration.
Anyway, let us point out a couple of details:

- the missing savegames are probably due to launching the SD version and not the HD. The "windowed" setting doesn't affect the savegames management. On the contrary, SD and HD versions are basically two different versions of the game, with incompatible savegames (engine limitation)

- we DID work on the game breaking bug you read about in the discussions. Before that, in case of memory exhaustion, the game became corrupted and yet allowed to save, which often left players stuck in a broken state. We changed that so that if there's not enough memory, now the game just terminates (with the error loading texture you mention). We added an auto-save system to prevent users wasting too much time replaying a long section of the game when trying again. As you experienced, trying again with different system load usually solves the issue. We know it's not perfect, but is what the budget allowed to do before switching all our development efforts on Act III. Hopefully in the future we will be able to come back again at Act I-II to further improve them and get rid of this problem for good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031670464', 'num_games_owned': 578, 'num_reviews': 485, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1552084049}
review:
Στα [+]
•  Εξαιρετική παραγωγή. Από τις πιο φροντισμένες και αστραφτερές δουλειές πού έχουν κυκλοφορήσει. 
•  Εντυπωσιακά καθαρά γραφικά στην HD εγκατάσταση του παιχνιδιού.
•  Η ανατροπή πού συντελείται στο τέλος του και πού σε κάνει να περιμένεις με ανυπομονησία τη συνέχειά του.

Στα [-]
•  Οι πολύ μικροί χώροι δράσης (όλες οι διαφημιζόμενες "διαφορετικές τοποθεσίες" περιορίζονται στην έκταση της μιάς οθόνης η κάθε μία) και τά ευδιάκριτα hot spots αποδυναμώνουν σε μεγάλο βαθμό τους γρίφους (μ' εξαίρεση ένα-δυό σημεία, όπου μάλλον θα παιδευτείς γιά νά βρείς τήν άκρη).
•  Οι περισσότεροι διάλογοι χρησιμοποιούνται σάν μέσον ανάδειξης χαρακτήρων και καταστάσεων, κάτι πού μπορεί να είναι θεμιτό για κινηματογραφικό ή λογοτεχνικό έργο, αλλά σ' ένα adventure, καί μάλιστα μικρής σχετικά διάρκειας, μετατρέπεται σέ μιάν ανούσια καί βαρετή φλυαρία (πολύ περισσότερο όταν αυτό πού προσπαθούν ν' αναδείξουν είναι ήδη γνωστό καί τετριμμένο).
•  Σε κάποια σημεία η κοινή λογική πάει περίπατο και μαζί της συμπαρασύρει κάθε προσπάθειά σου νά ταυτιστείς μέ τόν τρόπο σκέψης τού ήρωα. (Δεν είναι δυνατόν να κρατάς τη φωτογραφία κάποιου πού ψάχνεις και να μην ρωτάς κανέναν γι΄αυτήν, ούτε νάχεις τά κλειδιά τού δωμάτιου τού ανθρώπου πού θέλησαν νά δολοφονήσουν καί νά μήν έχεις τήν περιέργεια νά τό ψάξεις).
•  Οσο γιά τήν ηλικιωμένη γυναίκα πού χαρίζει τό ημερολόγιο τού πεθαμένου άντρα της στόν πρώτο τυχόντα πού τής χτυπάει τήν πόρτα, απλά σέ κάνει ν' αναρωτιέσαι άν πραγματικά ήταν τόσο δύσκολο νά εφευρεθεί ένας άλλος, πιό πειστικός τρόπος γιά τήν απόκτησή του.

Συνοψίζοντας
•  Οσοι ελκονται από τις αστραφτερές εικόνες και τις αφελείς αλλά σχετικά καλογραμμένες ιστορίες, θα βρεθούν στο στοιχείο τους. Οι υπόλοιποι μπορούν να το χαζέψουν στο σπίτι κάποιου φίλου.

Βαθμολογία: 2,5/5

http://adventures-index10.blogspot.com/2012/01/shadows-on-vatican-i-greed-10th-art.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198112272735', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1547917511}
review:
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33843777//] More interesting reviews on my Curator's Page[/url]

[i]When in Rome, make yourself at home![/i]

You play a former priest, currently Doctor James Murphy. The game starts with a flashback, during a charity mission to Africa, where our hero witnesses, for no apparent reason, the murder of his mentor, Bishop Dellerio. Presently, in Rome, you are urgently called by an ex-colleague priest and best friend, Cristoforo Ardemagni, who wishes to speak to you about what happened then. And from here onwards everything goes downhill fast! Your friend is found injured and is brought to hospital in a coma and you find yourself, without realising it, in a down spiral into hell: murder, fraud, conspiracy, in the spiritual and seemingly innocent meanders of the Vatican.

Taking place in Rome, this introductory episode is a quiet opening to a four-part story yet to be discovered. Its speed increases as the story evolves but remains quite unexciting until its cliff-hanger ending (now we’re talking!!).

Both settings and characters seem to jump out directly from a comic drawing board, pencil sketched and soft colouring. Beautifully drawn and very simple, the backgrounds depict quite well the heavy historical building-cluttered streets of Rome. Cutscenes, in graphic novel style, illustrate the progress of the story between gameplay.

 A pure point and click game, with a simple gameplay, free from convoluted tricks:  left click to pick, use or combine items and engage conversations; right click to describe items, surroundings, people.

In the English fully dubbed version, the voice-acting is acceptable, with some mishaps concerning the accents of characters who, supposedly, should be Italian and sound like north Americans.

For the aficionados of “whodunnit” and investigative mysteries, it’s a game worth playing. I certainly enjoyed playing it and that’s why I’m recommending it. However, it is still waiting for the full unravelling of the story: the first installment was released in 2012, the second in 2014 and the remaining  two are still to come. Though the developers are showing signs of some activity on Facebook (let’s hope it means good news), I strongly advise not to buy the game incomplete. It will only leave you frustrated and fidgety.

http://www.shadowsonthevatican.com/
https://www.facebook.com/pg/ShadowsOnTheVatican/posts/

Reviews:
https://adventuregamers.com/games/view/17290
http://www.gameboomers.com/reviews/Ss/ShadowsVatican/ShadowsVatican1.htm

author: {'steamid': '76561198111903675', 'num_games_owned': 260, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1546277322}
review:
Buona la prima per i ragazzi del 10th Art Studio.
Liberamente tratto da "In nome di Dio - La Morte di papa Luciani", il primo episodio delll'avventura prende forma nella Roma sede del Vaticano, procedendo tra intrighi, misteri, attentati ed inseguimenti.
La trama risulta plausibile ed omogenea, con dialoghi che riescono a mantenere il ritmo richiesto dall'ambientazione.
Gli intermezzi video resi a fumetto riescono a compendiare alcuni aspetti legnosi del motore grafco.
Tenuto conto dello sviluppo in più episodi, la durata di circa 2-3 ore e più che congrua.
Per quelli che utilizzano Linux, il gioco gira su Wine senza problemi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167958424', 'num_games_owned': 1193, 'num_reviews': 525, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1544816971}
review:
Хорошая игрушка... Но проходить её без прохождения из интернета, сложно и можно повредить себе мозг.
Подсказок тут нет, есть только нажатие пробела, который подсвечивает все интерактивные точки взаимодействия с предметами в игре. Но это вам не поможет.
В игре есть фото двух подозреваемых, и по логике вы идёте опрашивать людей, но нет нужно нажать на вывеску лавки и только тогда после нескольких сложных действий вы узнаете кто это! 
А вот с номерным знаком вообще беда - его мы записали, но в инвентаре его нет! Наш персонаж протянет его в диалоге из непонятно откуда, бармену, а потом нам дадут доступ к программе полиции... Ааааааа!!! Мой мозг! Что происходит?!)
- каждый раз я говорю себе, Полина ты играла в deponia / the whispered world special edition / memoria / Anna quest / bear with me - Ты наверняка сможешь пройти эту игру не заглядывая в интернет... Но нет, логика этих игр и разработчиков понять невозможно! Я просто смерюсь с этим. 👍
_________
Игрушка прикольная как детектив, интересно расследовать преступление. 
Если вам нечем заняться и вы любите кликалки и детективы, на пару вечеров зайдет игра. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197970728391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 229, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1541901477}
review:
Strange game. Not usre if I know what is really going on. Lots of idle chit chat. Also, when you click on something, the character says what you are doing. An example is, when you turn on the stove to sterilize needle, he says that is what he is doing. After you are done, he says I should shut off the stove. Now I can put the needle with the thread. Not sure why it all has to be told to you like you are a 5 year old, but it does it all game long. Just a very confusing mess of what you are doing.

Graphically, game is ok. But the game looks really squared off. Almost every corner of a table, a wall, a book, etc., everything is perfectly square. The voice acting is fair and every location you go to is minimilized. Very little of that area is shown. The music is pretty good. It makes it sound like something is always about to happen, but it rarely does.

Found myself pretty bored with this game. Took me around 2 hours to beat.  Need sleep, play this for about 10 minutes and sleep tight.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162381766', 'num_games_owned': 629, 'num_reviews': 547, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1539163339}
review:
Questo primo atto, come durata è piuttosto cortina, giusto 3 ore. Gli enigmi non son frustanti o illogici. Ma a volte le scelte di risolvere un enigma sono strane. Vedasi issarsi sull'impalcatura con un mazzo di chiavi. Graficamente è ben fatto come sfondi e doppiaggio italiano, i modelli 3d invece stonano un pò con lo sfondo. Cosa curiosa: Il gioco è crashato appena son terminati i crediti rimandandomi al desktop. Anche la storia è bella e complottistica al punto giusto, e finisce con un senso di curiosità nel sapere che succederà dopo. Anche la musica non è male. Una delle pecche maggiori di questo gioco sono i caricamenti di una partita salvata, ci mette troppo tempo a caricare il salvataggio.

Quindi i pro di questo titolo sono:

- Storia
- Doppiaggio
- Sfondi.
- Musica 

i contro sono:

- I personaggi che stonano lievemente con lo sfondo.
- Enigmi in cui loro soluzione è strana.
- Caricamento del salvataggio troppo lento. ^^;

Personalmente merita il prezzo pieno. Se per voi la poca durata di questo primo capitolo non vi da problemi. Altrimenti aspettate qualche sconto, ma in qualsiasi modo lo compriate, merita di essere giocato almeno per la storia. ^_^

author: {'steamid': '76561198012143442', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1476435504}
review:
While I have seen the investigative mechanics and puzzels done better, the story still holds up and would make this a worth while buy for people interested in point and click storys.
That said: 
The last update on act 3 (out of 4) came 2015 and ever since it's silence or an ominous ";)" from a Dev in the forums, so while I am not saying that this game is dead, I will recommend to hold off on the buy until all 4 chapters are available just so you don't waste your money. What's there is fun with 2 likeable main characters, but it's only half the story - not selfcontained.

*EDIT* It seems like I missed a developer announcement via facebook regarding chapter 3. Work seems to continue, link below by Paggio, one of the Devs.

Do not buy until the rest is released. The recommendation would be a firm "Yes" if all chapters were out.
developer_response: Actually, there is a new update about Act III ---> https://www.facebook.com/ShadowsOnTheVatican/photos/a.552899781407399.1073741825.456166207747424/1998069370223759/

author: {'steamid': '76561198344028004', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1529887987}
review: Shadows on the Vatican tem um enredo mais maduro do que a maioria dos Point e Click. Oferece puzzles de nível intermediário que contrastam com gráficos medianos e animações muito simples. No global, é desafiante, mas não esperem um jogo bonito. Ainda assim a história por trás do jogo vale muito a pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198427374354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 244, 'playtime_forever': 783, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 783, 'last_played': 1526369638}
review: As far as Indie point & click adventures go, I'm usually happy to forgive their low-budget shortcomings, so long as there's a spark of creativity there to win me over.  Unfortunately, I could not find this spark in Shadows on the Vatican Act I. The story is uninteresting, the puzzles run-of-the-mill, the characters flat, and the voice acting amateurish. I don't plan to buy Act 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164717916', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1591641549}
review:
Makes all the mistakes for these games:
- too much dialog
- boring
- slow
- 1D characters
- need to wander around sometimes for no reason

It's also ridden with bugs, for added kicks.

Even for the low price, this is terrible. There are free games which are better than this.

review: I liked Shadows on the Vatican acts 1 and 2 when I played them 2-3 years ago. I still hope they finish the series. That's why I'm sort of writing this to encourage the developers to finish what they started. I hope we'll see act 3 soon, but I'm skeptical as it has been a couple of years already.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087950543', 'num_games_owned': 731, 'num_reviews': 206, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1516818013}
review:
Перед покупкой я лично надеялся, что Shadows on the Vatican получится хотя бы неплохой игрой... Но к несчастью, данная игра оказалась очень даже хреновой.

Предупреждаю, что у Shadows on the Vatican вышло лишь [b]2 эпизода из 4-ёх[/b] запланированных, но даже наличие лишь половины игры не мешает написанию моего обзора, т.к. с этой игрой, лично для меня, уже все понятно. Также не вижу смысла размусоливать каждый эпизод по отдельности, поэтому сразу напишу про 2 эпизода.

Начну с плюсов:
[list]
[*] Неплохо нарисованные комиксные вставки.
[*] Неплохая музыка в меню (знаю, слишком натянуто).
[/list]

Всё. Ну, а теперь минусы:
[olist]
[*][b]Когда новые эпизоды?[/b] Как было уже выше сказано, сейчас вышло лишь 2 эпизода из 4-ёх. Проблема заключается в том, что разница между 1-ым и 2-ым составляет 1-1.5 года, а вот с момента выпуска 2-го эпизода прошло уже почти 3 года, а 3-го эпизода всё нет и нет. Новостей тоже нет, лишь в обсуждениях разработчики лишь намекают своими комментариями на продолжение. Но лично мне кажется, что на появление новых эпизодов не надо надеяться.
[*][b]Техническая сторона.[/b] Она ужасная! Долгие загрузки сохранений (при этом, непонятно, что там ТАКОГО загружается?), иногда нельзя пропустить диалоги (т.е. ты нажимаешь ЛКМ, чтоб пропустить диалог, но вместо этого голос персонажа пропадает, а реплика не исчезает, и лишь через некоторое время реплика исчезает), почти всегда текст выходит за рамки облака (а в русской версии всё ещё хуже: ладно б текст за рамки заходил, так ведь дошло до того, что не вся реплика отображается. И это очень часто происходит), а 3D модельки... Это просто ужас! Честно, если у вас не так много денег, а в 3D моделировании неопытны (или ленивы), тогда зачем делать 3D квест??! Разрабы, у вас же есть нормальные комиксные заставки, почему бы не сделать нормальный 2D квест в стиле комиксов? Это было бы в разы интересенее и не так ужасно.
[*][b]Геймплей.[/b] Тут просто ужасный. Настолько оказуаленного квеста я ещё не видел. 2-3 действия на одной локации - всё, вы её прошли. Вы серьёзно? Ах, да, казуальность заключается в том, что при комбинировании предметов уже сразу показывается, можно ли их комбинировать или нет (т.е. вы выбрали предмет в инвентаре, перетаскиваете к другому, и может показаться крестик, тип нельзя их скомбинировать).
[*][b]Сюжет.[/b] Я бы мог простить всё выше сказанное, если бы был хороший, инересный сюжет... Но его тут нет. Разгадку сюжета (т.е. возможную, т.к. не все эпизоды вышли) вы узнаете на половине 1-го эпизода, когда вы прочитаете [spoiler]дневник банкира[/spoiler], при этом главный герой догадался обо всём лишь в конце 2-го. При этом есть ещё такая маленькая проблема: если 1-ый эпизод [u]хоть как-то[/u] был интересен, то 2-ой мало что продвигает (хоть он и более насыщен на события).

[i]Что же в итоге?[/i] Shadows on the Vatican - средний квест, чьё окончание под большим вопросом. Если вам нужны игры, где легко получить все достижения за одно прохождение, то покупайте. Но если вам, как и мне, нужен хороший, интересный и [u]законченный[/u] квест, то не тратьте свои деньги и время и проходите мимо. Лучше поиграйте в более интересные игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010597228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 309, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1514107570}
review:
Schöner Auftakt, aber mit Makel.


Kirche und Verschwörungen, ein Thema das immer wieder interessat ist, hat doch diese Institution viele Geheimnisse verborgen - auch heute - die nicht für die Öffentlichkeit bestimmt sind... Meist geht es um das liebe Geld, worum geht es aber hier?

Wer ein klassisches Point and Click Adventure mag, wird hier ohne Frage gut bedient. DIe Rätsel belaufen sich fast ausschließlich aus Kombinieren und keine Schieberätsel versperren uns den Weg. Geschicktes, meist oder immer logisches Kombinieren bringt uns weiter, nur eine "Verfolgungsjagd" stellt sich, vor allem wenn man die Errungenschaft bekommen will als äußerst fragwürdig da...

Bugs sind mir keine aufgefallen, die HD-Version sieht logischerweise besser aus, als die verpixelte, auch da der Potagonist plötzlich hässlicher ist als die restlichen Umgebungsdetails oder Personen.

Die Spieldauer ist recht kurz, mit 2 mal durchspielen für die Errungenschaften rund 5 1/2 Stunden.

Und: Episodenformat, ohne Ende wenn es so bleibt... es gibt 2 Teile, der 3 und soweit ich weiß vorletzte Teil ist noch nicht erschienen und wird es auch eventuell nicht mehr... Schade!

Fazit:

Bedingt Empfehlenswert, auch wenn die Entwicklung vermutlich nicht abgeschlossen wird, was sehr schade ist! Wartet auf einen Sale!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198046343516', 'num_games_owned': 2899, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1513169601}
review:
[h1]Von Priestern, Bankern und einer Killerin[/h1]

Im Juni 2014 erschien der 1. Teil des auf eine Quadrologie ausgelegten Point n’click-Adventures „Shadows on the Vatican“ aus italienischem Hause, deren comichafter Stil mich interessierte und das lose auf einer literarischen Vorlage basiert (In nomine die, David Yallop). Man darf nur hoffen, dass die kaum existenten Hinweise auf die Umsetzung von Teil 3 und 4 ernst zu nehmen sind, um nicht erneut eine unvollendete Serienleiche zu haben (Teil 2 erschien Herbst 2015!). Also auf geht’s im 1. Teil [u]„Gier“[/u] nach Rom…

[b]Eine noch nie dagewesene Geschichte?[/b]
…von dem man aber kaum etwas Typisches zu Gesicht bekommt (wenn man von den oberflächlichen Stereotypen Fußball, Essen und Grappa absieht). Wir spielen den Ex-Priester und Jetzt-Arzt James Murphy aus Chicago, der bei seinem Heimaturlaub in Rom u. a. seinen früheren Priesterkollegen Cristoforo besucht. Bereits bei dem Intro, das eine Kriegsszene in Afrika zeigt, bei dem James‘ früherer Mentor ermordet wurde, weist auf eine tiefer gründende Hintergrundgeschichte. Und schon bald wird Cristoforo schwer verletzt und man nimmt die Spur eines Komplotts auf, in dem die Bankgeschäfte des Vatikans eine große Rolle spielen. 
Insgesamt also eine gemächliche Einführung des Plots und der Figuren und eine wie man meinen würde, schon 1000 Mal erzählte Verschwörungsgeschichte um den Vatikan. Erst gegen Ende nimmt das Ganze richtig Fahrt auf, als man einer jungen Frau begegnet, deren Alter Ego wir für ein paar Minuten übernehmen dürfen, bevor der Killer-Cliffhanger kommt.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1239188801
[b]So traditionell wie der Vatikan selbst[/b]
Es handelt sich um ein klassisches Point n’click-Spiel, dessen Bedienung mit Maus und Tastatur sehr leicht fällt, für Neulinge gibt es sogar ein Tutorial und eine Hotspotanzeige.
Auch die Rätsel machen keine Ausnahme und erlauben und altbekannte, aber immerhin gut eingebundene Kost, bei der man ab und zu auch um die Ecke denken muss. Völlig unnötig ist ein kleines Verfolgungsspiel, bei dem man an Kreuzungen per Zufall die richtige Abzweigung auswählen muss. Das basiert rein auf Glück (sofern ich nichts übersehen habe) und ist einfach nur nervig. Dies fängt das Speichersystem aber immerhin auf. 

[b]Alles lateinisch auf HD oder was?[/b]
Der Graphikstil innerhalb des Spiels ist nichts besonderes, comichaft und recht steril. Eher schwach sind die Animationen der Figuren, die zumindest bei mir sehr steif und hakelig waren. Dagegen sind die Zwischensequenzen positiv hervorzuheben, da sie comicstripartig eine schöne Atmosphäre schaffen. Dieser hilft auch der gute Soundtrack, der eine tolle Untermalung bildet; v. a. der Creditsong hat es mir angetan.
Kommen wir zur Vertonung: Die Gespräche sind auf Englisch und Italienisch eingesprochen, Deutsch und andere Sprachen gibt’s als Untertitel mit ein paar amüsanten Fehlern (Faul statt Foul).

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1239188750
[b]Sonstiges[/b]
Seit einiger Zeit besitzt das Spiel 6 Sammelkarten, von den 20 Errungenschaften sind 75% beim ersten Spieldurchlauf zu erreichen. Die anderen sind etwas aberwitzig, so muss man etwa am 24.12. einen Schornstein benutzen…
Die Spielzeit beläuft sich auf 3-4 Stunden, was für knapp 6 € noch okay ist.

[code]Ein durchschnittlicher Vertreter seiner Zunft mit einer am Ende spannenden, aber doch recht gewöhnlichen Geschichte. Punkten kann der Soundtrack und zum Teil die Rätsel, der Rest ist eher Normalkost. Da aber alles technisch einwandfrei lief und dies ja nur der Auftakt eines Vierteilers ist, gibt es einen Daumen schräg nach oben.[/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198032995265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1511661554}
review:
J'ai longuement hésité avant de me décider pour l'un des pouces qui m'étaient présentés... je vais m'essayer à l'exercice de l'objectivité froide, bien qu'elle soit sans doute illusoire.

Le scénario  :  pas mauvais en soi, on peut facilement être assez curieux pour vouloir connaître la suite. Mais j'ai été gêné par des passages qui manquaient vraiment de vraisemblances.

Les personnages : honnêtement, le seul personnage qui semble avoir de l'épaisseur apparait à la toute fin. J'ai trouvé les autres insipides, même le "héros" de l'intrigue. Souvent les personnages secondaires sont d'ailleurs des caricatures assez archétypales.

Les graphismes : sans doute pas le plus important sur ce type de jeu bien entendu. Les scènes découpées comme une BD entre les différentes actions m'ont plues, c'est un style, mais ce n'est pas envahissant et bien réalisé. En revanche pour le reste... les animations des personnages manquent cruellement de naturel et l'ambiance n'y est pas... ce sont les scènes "BD" qui sont les plus dynamiques...

Le "gameplay" : il est lourd, mais c'est l'apanage de ce type de jeu, ce serait un comble de se plaindre de longueurs. En revanche, j'ai trouvé que les "solutions" n'étaient pas si intuitives, elles ressemblent parfois trop à une succession d'essais d'items entre eux ou d'interaction avec le décor, parfois pas si logiques.

Les dialogues : inutilement bavards par moment, cela donne l'impression que tout a été misé sur eux pour mettre en oeuvre "l'ambiance". C'est bien sur normal, et même important, qu'ils y participent mais leur faire endosser seul cette responsabilité ! D'autant qu'en réalité ils ne sont pas toujours très réussis, certains tombent à plat ou manquent de sens (certains dialogues du proprio par ex).

Pour conclure, il me semble que je ne peux recommander ce jeu. On pourra sans doute m'objecter qu'il prend une dimension supérieure avec le 2ème chapitre (d'autant qu'il est visiblement centré sur le personnage qui apparait à la fin de ce premier opus) et que mon avis souffre d'une vison parcellaire de ce que peut offrir ce titre, mais dans tous les cas cette première partie ne m'a malheureusement pas suffisamment accroché pour que je me laisse convaincre.
