author: {'steamid': '76561198287475338', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1509890120}
review: Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed looks good. The 3D characters, both the model and various animations  look smooth and believable. When the characters speak they have their own half body portrait that will reflect their mood, which is very nice in this type of game. Different characters have accents for example Italian and American accents. The only problem is that it is extremely short, a little more than 2 hours. But it is still a very enjoyable game and it is like a prelude of what is to come in the second act, so I recommend it. Maybe get it on sale though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015003424', 'num_games_owned': 1489, 'num_reviews': 264, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1482620730}
review: If you are an avid adventure gamer, Shadows on the Vatican may be your cup of tea, even if it is a lukewarm one at best. For everyone else, there are probably much better games out there to get into the genre. The graphics are decent, but the voiceovers and writing are pretty bad and pretty corny, and the story in general feels too much like something out of The Da Vinci Code to be engaging.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990809098', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1508503791}
review:
Lackluster in every way.
- Looks terrible. The car chase sequence is a joke. The cartoon panel cutscenes are not bad, but not great either.
- Sounds terrible. Some of the music is nice, but not varied enough. There is no sound design at all.
- The limited voice actors does nothing to save the abysmal script.
- The story isn't very compelling. It's set in Rome, but there are next to no references to the city geographically, and Vatican city is completely absent. Curious, considering the game's title.
- Most importantly, the puzzles themselves are completely uninteresting and don't require any creative thought besides some simple logic and a bit of pixel hunting. 
Even in the limited landscape of adventure games, stay away from this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968599310', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1499752677}
review:
While the story does seem like it could eventually be interesting, I'm not sure it compells me enough to play more installments if they all have the same clunky animations, poor voice acting, and snail-like pace. Also I seem to have solved one puzzle just by random clicking, rather than clever deduction. Not that the puzzles are overly difficult. At least the music was good and the art was passable.

In any case, there are better games on which to spend your time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004685493', 'num_games_owned': 401, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1492459537}
review:
Класичний інді-квест для любителів різних теорій заговорів (зразу зауважу, що в ньому можна підсвічувати активні точки). Сюжет спочатку зірок з небес не хапає, але під кінець стає цікавішим. Беручи до уваги, що це лише перший акт, маю надію, що в наступних епізодах автори зможуть гідно закрутити інтригу. Потенціал для цього є.
Щодо графіки, то 3D-моделі та їх анімація дуже простенькі, але сцени і сюжетні комікси виконані непогано. Видно, що розробник більше художник, ніж програміст :) Загалом, враховуючи низьку ціну, легкість вибиття досягнень та офіційну русифікацію, я все ж таки поставлю позитивну оцінку, хоч і з натяжкою.

PS. До речі, гра має одну з самих оригінальних ачівок, які мені попадались у Стімі. Аплодую стоячи тому, хто зміг її вибити без підказки.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970662093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1488494820}
review:
Writing this review just to point out that the Key Features section of the store page for this game is almost entirely false. 

"...a thrilling new point-and-click adventure in 4 acts" [strike] False. There is no indication that parts three and four will ever be complete. [/strike] There is a hint that the remaining acts will follow, announced April 2022.
 
"Art direction by Lorenzo Ruggiero"  True, but a third tier inker with a bog standard resume seems like stretching the truth a bit too far in order to use the Marvel/DC credit.

"...with high resolution graphics and Full HD support" False.  Low quality models, backgrounds, etc., The HD version will not run on many systems and the developer's (paraphrased) solution is "Oh well, just run standard. The only difference is full HD backgrounds" meaning that "Full HD support" is an outright lie.

"Realistic characters with hours of motion-capture animations" False.  Awkward student-level character model design and laughable "motion capture."

"Well integrated puzzles..." False.

"Animated coloured comics..." False.  Zooming in and out and panning on a still image is hardly animation.

All told, you'll have a better time reading the wonderfully florid text of the store page.  The quality of writing here is far better than the in-game text and dialogues.  It was so well written, it convinced me to buy this below average, overly-ambitious game with all the red flags of a terrible adventure experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072450805', 'num_games_owned': 438, 'num_reviews': 799, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1455249452}
review:
Jednym zdaniem: Cienie nad Watykanem to udana gra przygodowo - detektywistyczna zrobiona z wyczuciem, klimatem, momentami nawet zabawna, a jej rozgrywka jest zróżnicowana jak na ten gatunek i szybko wciąga w świat ciemnych stron Watykanu. Przypomina się Kod Da Vinci, ale w lepszym wykonaniu.

Plusy:

+ niezwykle klimatyczne menu z porywającą muzyką
+ rysowane postacie w najlepszym komiksowym stylu
+ stylowo narysowane filmowe przerywniki w formie komiksowej
+ znakomicie napisane dialogi (rzadko w grze zdarzają się tak dobre)
+ bardzo ciekawe postacie jak żywi ludzie (zwłaszcza barman Mario, starsza Pani w  banku)
+ niezły początek fabularny (zabójstwo i malwersacje finansowe w Watykanie) 
+ zróżnicowana rozgrywka jak na point and click
+ zagadki na dobrze zbalansowanym poziomie
+ dużo inteligentnego poczucia humoru
+ pomysłowy achievement Ho, Ho, Ho,... ;)
+ fajny spiskowy klimat w grze
+ dobre głosy audio postaci

Minusy:

- główna postać jest trochę zbyt młoda z wyglądu jak na byłego księdza 
- pewne działania muszą być zrobione po kolei (nie możemy przeskoczyć niektórych działań)
- grafika postaci 3D w grze nie jest najwyższych lotów 

Komu polecam? / Komu odradzam? 

+ polecam miłośnikom przygodówek P&C
+ polecam tym, którzy cenią dobre dialogi
+ polecam fanom spiskowych klimatów
- odradzam traktującym religię zbyt zasadniczo

Rada: 

Lubisz tropić ciemne strony Watykanu w stylu Kodu da Vinci? To Shadows of Vatican jest grą właśnie dla Ciebie.

*Jeżeli chcesz poznać więcej moich recenzji,
zapraszam do obserwacji mojej strony kuratora Steam. 
==============================================
➥ Obserwuj mnie jako kuratora ⤵
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/10437106/

author: {'steamid': '76561198308019923', 'num_games_owned': 1443, 'num_reviews': 265, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1486548190}
review:
Metto sconsigliato ma il gioco non è totalmente negativo: semplicemente galleggia nel limbo della sufficienza/mediocrità e considerando le alternative dello stesso genere (avventure punta e clicca) si può tranquillamente spendere i propri soldi altrove.
Tecnicamente il gioco non brilla: da una parte abbiamo un comparto grafico di certo non esaltante ma che stranamente si rivela relativamente esoso di risorse, dall'altra un sonoro caratterizzato da ottime musiche ma da un doppiaggio pessimo che ricorda i primissimi titoli localizzati nella nostra lingua (qualcuno ricorda il vecchio Nocturnal? "Chi ci difenderà dalle forze del maleeee" pronunciato con l'accento bolognese...).
La trama, considerando che si parla del primo episodio, è poco giudicabile anche se le premesse non fanno pensare ad un capolavoro di originalità...

author: {'steamid': '76561198169199223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1486413873}
review:
Die Geschichte war schon ziemlich interessant und spannend, aber die Grafik...
Normalerweise ist mir das nicht so wichtig, aber hier war sie schon abartig schlecht. Einige Charaktere haben sich bewegt und mich angestarrt wie Epileptiker auf LSD. Ich hab schon 10 Jahre alte Spiele gespielt, die besser aussahen.
Wenn man sich ausschließlich auf die kurzen, schönen Cutscenes konzentriert (es ist unglaublich Schade. Wäre das ganze Spiel in diesem gezeichneten Stil würde ich 10/10 Punkte vergeben.) und das restliches Spiel so wenig wie nur irgend möglich anssieht, kann ich es eventuell empfehlen. Im Gesamtpaket - Nein! 
Ob ich mir den 2. Teil antue weiß ich noch nicht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019270397', 'num_games_owned': 4177, 'num_reviews': 733, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1486309111}
review:
Shadows on the Vatican est un bon thriller. L'acte 1 donne l'eau à la bouche et on veut connaître la suite ! 

Les énigmes sont intéressantes, certaines sont d'ailleurs assez originales (j'ai beaucoup aimé celle du livre et des images de saints). Elles forcent à être attentif et à réfléchir, sans simplement faire de manière frénétique toutes les combinaisons d'objets.

Les dessins des personnages lors des dialogues sont bien faits, ainsi que les cinématiques qui font penser à une bande-dessinée.

Par contre, il y a beaucoup de petits défauts qui viennent gâcher l'expérience de jeu :

- La modélisation des personnages catastrophique : le héros est raide comme un piquet avec une expression de visage abominable.
- Lorsqu'un objet ne peut pas être utilisé sur un autre élément, une simple croix rouge interdit l'action. Dommage... ça rend la résolution des énigmes à base d'objets trop facile.
- Dommage que le jeu ne nous laisse pas la main sur les recherches d'ordinateur...
- La course poursuite en voiture est pénible...

Mais malgré ces défauts, je conseille ce jeu et m'attelle dès maintenant à la suite... >> 14/20

author: {'steamid': '76561198103916275', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1484494322}
review:
Grundsolide aber unspektakulär – für Fans von Kirchenverschwörungen

Mit dem ersten Akt zu ihrem Episodenspiel „Shadows on the Vatican“ liefern die italienischen Entwickler grundsolide Adventure-Kost auf Basis des klassischen Point & Click-Schemas. Fast schon ist man gewillt zu sagen, dass das Spiel zu solide sei, denn irgendwelche Besonderheiten, welche den Titel aus der Masse an Adventures hervorstechen lassen, sind kaum vorhanden. Ein netter Themesong und gefällige Comic-Zeichnungen alleine reichen heutzutage halt nicht mehr aus. Größtes Problem ist jedoch die mickrige Spielzeit in Kombination mit einem nach wie vor unvollständigen Gesamtprodukt, bei dem man noch nicht einmal sicher sein kann, ob die letzten beiden Akte überhaupt noch fertiggestellt werden. Wem das nichts ausmacht, und der sich für die Thematik interessiert, der darf aber durchaus zugreifen. Spaß macht es ja durchaus, wenn man Point & Click-Adventures mag.


Pro und Kontra:

Pro:
- vernünftiger Schwierigkeitsgrad, man kann das Spiel recht gut aus eigener Kraft bewältigen
- gute Comic-Zeichnungen für Zwischensequenzen und Charakter-Portraits
- gelungener Themesong
- fieser Cliffhanger macht Lust auf mehr

Neutral:
- Standard Point & Click-Adventure-Gameplay ohne nennenswerte Höhen und Tiefen
- die Handlung in Akt I gelangt nicht über Krimi-Standards hinaus

Kontra:
- sehr kurze Spielzeit von etwa 3 Stunden
- bemerkenswert minderwertige 3D-Charaktermodelle
- das witzlose Auto-Verfolgungsjagd-Ratespielchen hätte es echt nicht gebraucht


Das vollständige Review: http://www.gamecontrast.de/shadows-on-the-vatican-akt-i-gier-review/#more-61466

author: {'steamid': '76561198075875415', 'num_games_owned': 366, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 650, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 650, 'last_played': 1483809193}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025674597', 'num_games_owned': 2061, 'num_reviews': 607, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1482554914}
review:
This is a pretty good point-and-click game, with an interesting story that revolves around mistery and secret plots. The writing is pretty good as well, and it keeps you hooked into the story, not to mention that the environments and the puzzles are well designed. Even as someone who doesn't play a lot of point-and-click games, I found most of the puzzles to be pretty intuitive; although I must admit there were certain instances in which I had to look for a guide, as I had no idea what to do. Still, that's got more to do with me not being used to this genre, than with the puzzles being too confusing; heck, there were a few times in which I had the right idea, but didn't know how to execute it.

Talking a bit more about the writing, the dialogue is pretty good and, despite its mostly serious tone, there's a few funny moments here and there, that actually manage to feel natural. Not to mention a couple of easter eggs hidden across the game.

Well, I don't know what more to say about this. It's a short game, and, as I mentioned, I'm not an expert on this genre, but it's still pretty good in my opinion. Also, I really want to see where the story goes next, as this is part of an episodic series.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123831717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1484767227}
review:
Good game, nice scenario. 
Fells like you're in a movie.
Most of these kinds of games has less visuals and lets you imagine the scene, but in this game they made the scenes 3D and more visual.
If you like investigating, you can buy, it's worth what it costs.

In the other hand, it doesn't give you much opportunity to move arounds, most of the times you have to find what's the next step of the scenario and follow it. But since game has a nice scenario, that's okay.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995749658', 'num_games_owned': 1958, 'num_reviews': 1565, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1483434306}
review:
Point / Click Adventure
Ernste Geschichte.
Space zeigt benutzbare Dinge an (die aber größtenteils langweilig sind).
Full HD Version ist versteckt (In Steam Bibliothek Rechte Maus auf das Spiel). Saves nicht kompatibel. D'oh!.
Es hat mich einfach nicht gepackt und nach dem Krankenhaus war nicht klar wie es weitergehen soll.
Hatte dann zu Hause einen "Script Error" und dachte der hindert mich am Weiterkommen.
Nein man muss einfach nur mehrmals mit der Nonne reden. Also so was.
Es gibt einfach lustigere, interessantere und zugänglichere Adventures.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970127820', 'num_games_owned': 323, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1483379734}
review:
Bueno, después de hace mucho tiempo sin jugar a ninguna aventura gráfica me decidido por empezar una y, vi que Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed y Act II estaban de oferta. Así que empecé por este primero.

La aventura en si está bien, es bastante fácil y se puede pasar en menos de dos horas, que por cierto hay un logro sobre esto mismo. Si lo completas en menos de dos horas lo activas. Tiene misterio y me ha dejado con la intriga de saber qué pasará con la aventura, así que me pondré con el Act II enseguida.

Decir que los diálogos tienen bastantes faltas de ortografía y las frases no están muy bien redactadas pero aún así se aprecia el esfuerzo de haberla traducido, no como otros que no voy a mencionar. También tiene algunos bugs leves, como que los personajes, los cuales son en 3D, hacen movimientos extraños a veces y en verdad, estos personajes contrastan mucho con el entorno. Se agradece el 3D en imágenes 2D pero casi hubiera preferido los personajes en 3D pero con aparencia de dibujado con el resto, para no contrastar tanto.

Tiene algunas cosas divertidas, como poder ver a "medias" el gol maradoniano de Maradona xD y otras cosas más que mejor las pruebes por tí mismo.

En resúmen, para la gente que le gusten las aventuras gráficas y quiera jugar una que no se alargue mucho,  os la recomiendo, seguramente acabaréis jugando el Act II una vez completado el primero.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076655805', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1434971199}

author: {'steamid': '76561198007688772', 'num_games_owned': 1263, 'num_reviews': 649, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1483351988}
review:
No nic moc.
Příběh prvního aktu je utahaný a nepříliš zajímavý. Dialogy jsou plné nezáživného žvanění, které s hlavní hrou nesouvisí a ani mě nezajímá, protože jsem si k žádné postavě nevybudoval jakýkoliv vztah. Dabing postav kolísá mezi slušným u hlavního hrdiny a hereckým neumětelstvím např. v případě postavy Silvie. Grafika prostředí se povedla, ale postavy dopadly o dost hůř. Mnoho postav včetně té hlavní vypadá jako plastový panák s tuhou animací a mrtvolným výrazem ve tváři. Cutscény a dialogové portéty jsou přitom zpracované docela pěkným komiksovým stylem; nerozumím, proč stejně nevypadá i zbytek hry.
Herně to celkem jde, k ovládání nemám výhrady. Hádanky jsou ale často přestřeleně obtížné, konzultovat návod jsem musel několikrát. Ne, že by šlo o tak komplexní problémy, ale hra poskytuje zoufale málo indicií k řešení. Občas mi ani po prostudování návodu nebylo jasné, jak jsem na to měl vlastně přijít. Používání předmětů někdy také nedává vůbec smysl.
Herní doba je navíc cca 2.5 hodiny. Hodně váhám, jestli doporučit nebo ne. Nakonec asi palec nahoru, ale je to jen tak tak a doporučuji pouze ve slevě, základních 6 euro je moc.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052933734', 'num_games_owned': 4633, 'num_reviews': 571, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1482505806}
review:
主人公のジェームズ兄貴が､友人を襲撃した何者かを追って
奔走する､推理モノのポイント＆クリックゲーム｡
第1章なので､起承転結の転ぐらいのところで終わってしまう｡
ゲームとしては､まぁ普通｡全編英語で読めなくて辛いし､
3DポリゴンはPS1時代並みのクオリティでショボい｡
また､一度も間違えずに正しい道を進めとか､
前情報なしの初見プレイだとまず達成不能な実績があったり､
期間限定のクリスマス実績があったりして面倒｡

トレカ・実績対応｡定価だと高め｡全実績解除まで1～3時間｡
特別面白いわけでも､死ぬほどつまらないわけでもない凡ゲー｡
続編として2が出ているが､当面は保留でいいやって感じ｡
まぁサムズダウンするほどではないかな､という評価｡

author: {'steamid': '76561198031519783', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 473, 'last_played': 1482573662}
review:
Apesar do jogo ser um pouco amador em todos os aspectos técnicos, possui uma história interessante, bem como seus personagens. A interação com os cenários também é boa - quase muito boa. As soluções para os mistérios são, apesar de um pouco clichês, intuitivas. Não é um grandioso jogo de adventure, porém é simpático e está na média. 
É no mínimo um bom jogo! Recomendo a todos que curtem este estilo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041219230', 'num_games_owned': 230, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1472403345}
review:
Neat little adventure game. The backgrounds are always pretty spot on, and the dialogue flows nicely most of the time. The level of difficulty also worked for me. The model animation is clunky, yeah, but I can't really expect any better from a game that cost me nickels.

Obviously, it's only Act I of the entire series, so there's no proper conclusion to the game. It's unclear whether the devs will be able to churn out all the parts, but at least there's Act II available.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972822414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 412, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1473619094}
review: This is an uninspiring point and click game. For me the story flowed too slowly, you just seemed to be vaguely following clues with not enough exposition. This also made the puzzles disappointing as they just felt you were arbitrarily clicking things without knowing what you were trying to achieve. The 2D artwork is excellent which then contrasts with the poor 3D character models. So will I buy episode 2? Maybe, I’m really not sure, the plot does come together at the end which makes me curious to know what happens next but I’m not convinced based on the rest of this game. In the end I am giving this a thumbs up but only just, it is not a bad game but it sure isn’t a good game.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198063294557', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1469963436}
review: Der "rote Faden" fehlt. Ich wusste nicht was ich tun oder suchen sollte. Das Tutorial ist noch schlüssig, eine simple Aufgabe die man durchführen kann. Dann den Treffpunkt aufsuchen, auch noch einleuchtend. Aber nach den Sequenzen blieb ich ratlos zurück. In Adventuregames kommt man immer wieder mal an den Punkt wo man alles mit jedem zu kombinieren versucht um weiter zu kommen, hier war dies bereits in den ersten Minuten der Fall. Dazu ellenlange Texte. Nach rund 20Minuten habe ich das Spiel beendet und werde es sicher nicht weiterspielen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061041882', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1468542483}
review: In short this game feels very rough. The animations are clunky and jerky as well as character models are not the best quality. The comic cut scenes, which I looked forward to most, are low res. Imo, the best thing in the game is the character portraits while talking (if you have that option on). The load screens are absolutely awful, long and drawn out. Especially when saving/loading. It feels extremely boring and unclear of what your next task is and it feels slow and almost pointless in how to progress. The game was lacking, the story seemed like it might have potential. Personally I'd rather just watch a walkthrough.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272248465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1622067896}
review: Avventura grafica - punta e clicca - di qualità scadente. Lento a caricare, salvare e a cambiare schermata, pieno di disegni in sostituzione del movimento  - gioco molto breve. I posti, quasi tutti, si ritrovano nel 2^ capitolo. C'è di meglio. Grafica scarsa. Sconsigliato a 5 euro.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021369844', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1467568730}
review:
In the Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed you play as an ex-priest that aspires to be/is a doctor. Due to a sinful world you tragically lose your friend and your suspicion leads you to investigate his death which leads to a awesome cliffhanger that will get you excited for part 2.

This game is fun to play for as long as it lasts although all the talking can get a bit tedious and I started "fast" reading and thus skipping what I felt were useless conversations. There were no bugs while playing and the puzzles are alright although I did experience a little difficulty while finding the banks location. 

The most enjoyable elements of this game are the soundtracks and the cutscenes. I really enjoyed these, they used a good artstyle and the story was alright but maybe a bit predictable.

review:
Sarebbe anche un gioco carino.
Se non fosse che i salvataggi non funzionano.
E' cosi, salvo, controllo che lo abbia fatto, chiudo il gioco, riapro e PUF, niente salvataggi.
Mi sono un po rotto le palle di ricominciarlo dopo la terza volta.
developer_response:
Ciao, ci spieghi meglio cosa succede? Ci è arrivata un'altra segnalazione relativa a salvataggi fantasma (http://steamcommunity.com/app/286360/discussions/0/371919771763582966/) , ma non siamo riusciti a replicare il problema.
Quando controlli che abbia salvato, nella finestra di "carica", il salvataggio c'è, mi pare di capire. Riesci anche a caricarlo, prima di chiudere?

Quando poi chiudi, puoi vedere se trovi i salvataggi in 
%USERPROFILE%\Saved Games\shadows on the vatican act i" (versione SD) version) o "%USERPROFILE%\Saved Games\shadows on the vatican act i hd" (versione HD)?

Hai qualche carattere strano nel nome utente (e quindi nella cartella %USERPROFILE%)?

Grazie dell'attenzione, e spiacenti per il problema...

author: {'steamid': '76561198004888674', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1464004857}
review:
I was never big fan of point-n-click adventure games.
I just hate clicking on everything to find next clue.
Well Shadows on the Vatican is really nice game. I really enjoy it.

So why i don't recomend it? 
First of all it is short. And i mean [b]really short[/b]!
Second of all i hate cutting a game to so called "acts". I think it is a little scam to give 2 h of gameplay and you need to buy a rest.

As for visuals and music and the story it is really nice. Some dialoges are... naive at best but still this is nice game.

I would recomend this as a free game. As paid... well it is damn to short!

author: {'steamid': '76561198214448080', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1460888597}
review: Очень интересный сюжет,захватывающии истории и довольно долгая игра. НО в игре некоторые очень долгие и нудные сцены нельзя пропустить. моя оценка 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198198711177', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1663604923}
review: The game is very good. I enjoy playing it. It's about 4 hours to play. It's classic adventure game with logical puzzles. The puzzles are not too hard, but just hard enough. The ambient music is awsome,  I love music in the capena church. The actor voices are good enough. The story is great and good implemented with puzzles. You can read some books to know more about the story. The dialogs are good and classic written. I love the inventory. Its easy and functional. If you try to give something to someone and it's not correctly, then it appears red x in inventory, cool staff.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052510862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 127, 'playtime_forever': 206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 206, 'last_played': 1438125804}
review:
Faccio questa rece in concomitanza con la chiusura del secondo capitolo (appena recensito appunto)
Io mi sono divertito a giocare a questa avventura italiana. A tratti ben scritta e con personaggi credibili. Ve la consiglio assolutamente anche se ora è leggermente datata.
Tre difetti per me principali:
1. i capelli del protagonista sono ingiustificabili e insensati.
2. la scirpa della roma dentro al bar ha scatenato fastiosi istinti dentro di me
3. il romanesco è pessimo... ma questo anche nel 2

Enigmi ligici e contestualizzati. Storia avvincente. Bravi.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991978991', 'num_games_owned': 638, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1462368776}
review: I received the title for free from Indiegala and enjoyed it very much. It could be hard if you are new to the Point & Click games. The scenes look nice and the dialog was interesting and fun. The big downside of this game is the short 3 to 4 hour playtime. It left me curious about what happens in the next chapter but didn't had enough time to hook me for the story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115158556', 'num_games_owned': 1401, 'num_reviews': 392, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1462245462}
review:
8/10 - A Sinister Plot Unravels In the Streets of Rome!

This game is spread out over (4) episodes. There are only (2) out at this time and this review only reflects the first offering. I was really impressed though; it reminded me of Face Noir and other classic and well-crafted Point and Click games. The story is quite original and the voice acting and atmosphere are really on point. The graphics are of good/moderate quality, but the way all the elements come together makes this game pretty special.

The story follows ex-priest James Murphy, a doctor on leave to visit a friend and former colleague. Things start to unfold when James receives a disturbing call from his friend about a potential conspiracy with the Vatican. Will you be able to solve the mystery and find out what lurks in the shadows?

My only complaint is the rate at which these games are coming out. The 2nd title came out (16) months after the first was released; although I did really like this game, that's a tremendous amount of time to wait for 3 hour installments. Based on this 16 month guesstimation; part 3 is due out February 2017! I really hope I remember to check it out...

It's worth the $7; an enjoyable, but short Point and Click. Easy to grab on sale!

author: {'steamid': '76561198028395313', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1462115632}
review:
Un'avventura grafica molto piacevole da giocare

Punti di Forza:

- Una trama interessante ambientata a Roma 
(tema ecclesiastico)
- Gioco italiano
- Punta e clicca in stile classico con la possibilità di combinare gli oggetti 
(per alcune situazioni)
- Mario ci voleva
- Silvia ci voleva
- Un buon doppiaggio in italiano
- Ambienti realizzati molto bene
- Ottimi disegni in stile fumetto
- Bella colonna sonora del menù principale

Punti di Debolezza:

- I modelli dei personaggi possono essere migliorati (gli ambienti sono fatti molto meglio)
- Gioco a episodi

Comprerò sicuramente il seguito

Voto: 7

author: {'steamid': '76561198029068772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1460805959}
{'steamid': '76561198132441276', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 242, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1461017153}
review:
Összességében ajánlom a sztori miatt, de sok hiba van a játékkal.

Töltőképernyő kicsit hosszabb a kelleténél például mentésnél, betöltésnél egyaránt.
Az autós jelenet elég fárasztó és gyenge. Teljesen felesleges rész.
Van pár helyzet, amikor meg kell nézni, hogy mit is kell csinálni, ami nem azért van, mert nem szántam rá elég időt, hogy rájöjjek, hanem azért mert elég bugyuta. (pl.: amikor a könyvben meg kell találni az összefüggéseket.)
És jó néhány alkalommal volt mikor befagyott az egész és mivel nem másodpercenként mentettem így 1-1,5 óra minimum ment a kukába. Tehát saveljetek sűrűn.

A sztori viszont nagyon jó.
Grafika kiváló.

6/10

A 2. rész már kijött és reméljük, hogy a maradék két részre nem kell annyit várni, mint a másodikra.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096691705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2887, 'last_played': 1456482942}
review: Gra niestety jest podzielona na części (czego nienawidzę), niemniej jednak piszę tą recenzję po przejściu dwóch części i tak: pierwsza część jest dość monotonna, momentami trochę nudnawa, ale odbrabia to mocno w drugiej części. Nie jest takaś mega - powalająca, ale dość przyjemnie się w nią gra, jak już przebrnie się przez tą nudniejszą część wprowadzenia. Zobaczymy jak będzie w kolejnych częściach. Gdyby pierwsza część była samodzielną grą to raczej bym jej nie poleciła i to jest właśnie problem z oceną, bo być może w ujęciu całościowym okaże się fantastyczna. Dlatego właśnie dzielenie gry na części wywołuje takie mieszane uczucia, bo przecież płacisz za tą grę oddzielnie, a ona jest nudna, jako że pełni funkcję wstępu. Polecam zagrać jeśli planujesz przejść ją w całości, jeśli nie to szkoda kasy na pierwszą część.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061510838', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1459348770}

author: {'steamid': '76561198073929346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1630183384}
review:
2 godziny i koniec :( Miejscami fajne zagadki. Generalnie spoko gra... polecam miłośnikom przygodówek.

Z innych rzeczy:
a) grafika sie rozciąga na ekranie (w 1920 jest w okienku) - nie wygląda to specjalnie dobrze
b) cut-sceny są spikselizowane 
c) niektóre animacje i grafiki w grze są powiedzmy... słabej jakości, a niektóre OK... różnie z tym bywa. To samo tła lokacji.
d) dźwięk jest ok
e) fabuła bez szału ale powiedzmy, że wystarczy
f) długie czasy ładowania save game... ale generalnie to niepotrzebne, bo jest i tak krótka
g) zacinające się animacje i dialogi przy przeskakiwaniu

author: {'steamid': '76561198165845500', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 2274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1590144834}

author: {'steamid': '76561198042759221', 'num_games_owned': 856, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1450984370}
review:
If you're looking for a glorified visual novel, look no further.

Personally, I didn't find the storyline all that interesting and though there were some puzzles, a lot of it was just sitting around talking to people or being told where to go and what to do. I'd have liked a bit more freedom in playing or maybe even the opportunity to play a different character alongside the main one. While it's obvious you're going to follow a fairly religious gameplay since you control a former priest, the game really doesn't give you much freedom or choice with this. You're given options then immediately pushed towards the safer option, pretty much just giving you the illusion of choice and no real impact.

review: Una vera e propria sorpresa! Ovviamente uno non si aspetta di trovare animazioni sofisticate e robe del genere, ma l'atmosfera è molto attraente e in generale è piacevole giocarci. I pensieri del protagonista sono divertenti e uno veramente vuole andare avanti con la storia. Ecco il principale problema: a quanto pare i capitoli vengono fuori uno all'anno. Esageratamente troppo tempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006023558', 'num_games_owned': 2050, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1456074772}
review:
The game itself is not bad, but it's buggy at times, and no clues avaliable made me mad not once.
The walking should be just removed. We really don't need to look at those chars walking.
It's a bit clumsy but the story makes me recommend this game.. Too bad I have only Act I.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017843065', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1455057731}
review:
Slow, short, indie, point and click adventure.

Awkwardly drawn and executed. 'Story rich' in this case means long dialogues with almost amusingly bad voice acting, skipping is possible but not always instant. I lost interest in the story because it was so slowly delivered. Walking from point to point is slow too. The puzzles are few but not the most logical, trial and error will get you past some and a walk-through may be necessary for the less patient.

Quick and easy to 100%.

If you are a really big fan of the genre and need a cheap fix this game is often bundled and discounted.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045154276', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1451854828}
review:
Gioco completamente realizzato in Italia e non a caso ambientato a Roma, avventura grafica molto ben realizzata con tanti dialoghi stile fumetto. Il protagonista è James Murphy, un ex-sacerdote e ora medico americano, che si ritroverà ad indagare in loschi affari condotti dalla Banca Vaticana di cui, attraverso varie circostanze, rimane vittima un suo amico sacerdote, Cristoforo. 
Il gioco per essere completato richiede circa 5 ore.
Ho molto apprezzato questo gioco perchè è il classico esempio di come da giochi non "eccezionali" possano nascere dei piccoli capolavori.
Voto 70/100

review: Exciting and intriging, Shadows on the Vatican Act 1 offers a taste into the darkside of the catholic church. Handdrawn graphics are excellent. author: {'steamid': '76561198141404871', 'num_games_owned': 910, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1450998660}
review:
Based loosely on the novel "In Nome di Dio" (In God's Name) by Dave Yallop published originally in 1997.  This is a four game series two of which have been released.  (Shadows of the Vatican Act 1: Greed and Shadows of the Vatican Act 2: Wrath)

Storyline: James Murphy left the priesthood in 1996 after the Vatican's investigation into his mentor's death was less then effective and the Vatican proved to be even less interested.  In present day he is a medical doctor in Chicago, IL (USA).  He has returned to Italy at the request of his friend Father Cristoforo who has urgent and vital information for him.  Before Cristoforo can impart this information to James, Cristoforo is nearly killed when he fell (or was pushed) down a flight of stairs.  In Act 1, James is trying to find out what Cristoforo wanted to tell him by following the clues Cristoforo left for him.  

Gameplay: Classic type point and game with a strong linear storyline.  The space bar brings up small magnifying glasses for search areas or areas of interest.  Since it is based on a book the storyline follows the plot of the book, and dialogue is essential to follow the story.  

Despite the 3D graphics most of the game has, the cutscenes are drawn comic book panels.  This in no way detracts from the gameplay and a simple picture or two progresses the gameplay quickly and concisely.  

There is only one actual puzzle, a maze more concisely, in this game.  It is a car chase! 

Mystery, intrique, greed, deception and quite possibly murder, what more could anyone want from a thriller?

author: {'steamid': '76561198139563955', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 1341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 587, 'last_played': 1476483185}
review:
Catorce años después de abandonar el sacerdocio, James Murphy retorna a Roma respondiendo a la misteriosa invitación realizada por su amigo el Padre Cristoforo. Sea lo que fuera que deseaba contarle un desafortunado accidente lo impide. James sospecha enseguida que esto es más de lo que parece. Sus pesquisas le llevarán a toparse con una conspiración económica en la que la Iglesia está metida y que puede costarle muy caro si decide continuar.

[b]Lo mejor.[/b] Original combinación de gráficos entre el 3D y la viñeta. Buena trama y banda sonora.

[b]Lo peor.[/b] La traducción de este Acto no acaba de ser correcta, pero que diantres, al menos está en español. Falta carisma a los personajes. Que sea una entrega por capítulos dejando taaanto tiempo entre sus apariciones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198167062699', 'num_games_owned': 1784, 'num_reviews': 520, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1448104178}

review:
La storia sembra interessante, però questo è solo il primo atto, per andare avanti bisogna acquistare anche gli altri atti. Si potrebbe migliorare di più la grafica dei personaggi, movimenti, ecc... Ci sono altri giochi dello stesso genere fatti molto meglio. Effetti sonori e musiche di sotto fondo passabili.
3.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198050538723', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1468680750}
review:
O Shadows on the Vatican dowiedziałem się troszkę przypadkiem, z drugiej strony nigdy nie byłem miłośnikiem gier z podzielonymi aktami, epizodami itd. Ale grę kupiłem w ciemno i nie zawiodłem się, bo fabularnie jest bardzo dobrze tylko tyle, że steam posiada pierwszy akt więc musiałem nabyć gdzie indziej II akt który bije na łeb na szyję pierwszy akt. Czy to samą długością rozgrywki, czy choćby lokacyjnie czy nawet samą trudnością choć gra sama w sobie jest łatwa. GORĄCO POLECAM

Zalety:

+ Świetna fabuła
+ Fajny zarys Watykanu
+ Trzymająca w napięciu

Wady:

- Krótkość gry
- Podzielność na akty
- Zbyt łatwa

author: {'steamid': '76561198038819876', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1446206292}
review:
Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed is a game with potential. The story is decent and interesting enough to keep me playing, the sound and music are good, and the gameplay is what you would expect from point and click game. But what I really hate with it is the 3D animation for the characters, it's so stiff and awkward like it was made in early 90's. They should have stick with their comic cutscenes, it looks better.

Act 2 just been released and I think I will wait for it to go on sale or get the key for free somewhere later. The game is not bad overall, but I just don't like it much.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021677425', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1415215330}
review:
Με ασυνήθιστη και τολμηρή –ειδικά για Ιταλούς developers- θεματολογία, δείχνει να διαθέτει τα εχέγγυα για να αποτελέσει μία πολύ ενδιαφέρουσα gaming εμπειρία. Ας ελπίσουμε ότι αφ’ ενός η ιστορία του δε θα “ξεφουσκώσει” στη συνέχεια, αφ’ ετέρου δε θα κάνουμε περισσότερους από λίγους μήνες για να τη δούμε.

An unusual and bold-themed (especially for Italians developers) adventure game, which clearly has the potential to be a very interesting gaming experience. We really hope that Act III and Act IV will soon become available, further unfolding and completing the intriguing story.

http://ragequit.gr/reviews/item/shadows-on-the-vatican-act-1-greed-act-2-wrath-pc-review

author: {'steamid': '76561198078202213', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1537561947}
review:
Molto carino.

Trama: Siamo nei panni di un ex sacerdote tornato a Roma dopo anni per incontrare un nostro vecchio amico, Cristoforo. Cristoforo ci vuol vedere il prima possibile perché c'è qualcosa di cui vuole parlarci ma noi non faremo in tempo. Prima d'incontrarlo gli capita un "incidente" e da qui si sviluppa l'inizio della vicenda.

Grafica e Sonoro: I disegni sono eccezionali. La grafica del gioco invece "gracchia". Disegni così belli rendono ancora più antiestetica la grafica del gioco. Comunque non si può pretendere molto e il suo piccolo dovere lo fa'. Il sonoro è davvero ottimo invece. 

Complessivamente: Personalmente lo consiglio. Non è un gioco rivoluzionario, mi ha fatto comunque passare dei bei momenti. In parte mi ha fatto sorridere per le frasi un po' sciocche dei personaggi, a tratti riflettere e pensare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023996575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1442775358}
review:
"Shadows on the Vatican:  Act 1:  Greed" was meant to be the first entry in a series of four games.  Indications are the series was canned after the Italian release of Act 2, meaning that for most of the potential audience this is little more than a taster for a story that will never be completed.  That in itself may be enough reason to consider not buying it.  Speaking for myself -- I'm a massive adventure game fan.  Even with knowing that the series would not be going anywhere, I still bought the game and completed it.  (Honestly, because I feel like I need to play everything in the genre ...)

The controls are fairly standard -- right click to look, left click to interact and/or walk to a point on the screen.  

Graphics are mediocre;  the jerky, stiff animations are especially jarring.  There are comic book panels which probably looked good originally, but they were scanned at such a low resolution that they ended up fuzzy and requiring of a fair bit of concentration to make out their contents.

English-language voice acting ranges from good to very poor (everyone is voice acted -- and that will be important for some).  The main character sounds like Charlie Sheen, consider for yourself whether that is a plus or a minus.

Puzzles are varied and inventive.  However, although I would generally consider inventiveness in puzzle design a plus, it does require a slow build-up in order to acclimatise the player -- meaning using a certain gameplay dynamic in puzzles of ever-increasing complexity -- which is something this game doesn't do.  (In other words, some will probably be stumped early on.)

The storytelling feels similarly rushed:  there is next to no world building, meaning that everything you do is an action that serves to drive the plot forward;  adventure games tend to make use of menial tasks (as components of puzzles) in order to facilitate world building and immerse the player.  This game has very little in the way of menial tasks, aside from a short tutorial, which means that you'll be thrown into a series of locations and situations which were probably interesting in the writer/designer's mind but are boring in their presentation.  For example, take me to some ancient buildings, yes, but do something like the Broken Sword games and make me appreciate that I'm visiting an ancient building.  The game is set in Rome, for crying out loud.  Rome is an interesting place.  Show me Rome!  

In closing, regardless of whether I recommend this or not hardcore adventure gamers will probably buy it.  (As they should.)  For the rest, I don't see why anyone should be spending money on what is in essence the first quarter of a story that you'll never be able to finish.  The game is rather short too.  (And the poor achievement design means you'll need a guide to get 100% -- I guarantee you.)

Either way, in the name of fairness, I'm willing to alter this review to a recommendation should the missing Acts ever be completed and published on Steam.  For all its faults there's a lot of untapped potential here, and I'd love to see where this small but talented team of developers takes this series next (should they take it anywhere at all).

***

EDIT:

And here it is!  The second episode is out.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/378630/

I am surprised, but pleasantly so.  For the time being I'll leave this review as is.  Once I've played through Episode II, I plan on coming back and editing it accordingly.

That means it may become a positive or remain a negative, depending on how well Episode II builds on -- and improves on -- what has gone before.

review:
Так уж и быть поставлю палец вверх, но можно было и лучше.

Сюжет не плох, но исполнение хромает. Персонажи уродливые, а анимация кривая. Мне понравились заставки в стили комикса, они были действительно отлично нарисованы и смотрелись очень классно. review:
Dobrze się grało, ciekawa fabuła, zagadki na odpowiednim poziomie oraz ciekawa postać głównego bohatera. Tylko te animacje czasami są okropne, jak np. kuca by sięgnąć po modlitewnik ze stoli tao wygląda jakby... przygotowywał się na dłuższe posiedzenie w toalecie.

Mimo wszystko spoko i bardzo mi się spodobał pomysł na osiągnięcie: "Ho ho ho! Try entering from the chimney on December 24th".

Szkoda tylko że na steamie niema kolejnych części gry... no i szkoda że 3 i 4 jakoś nie zapowiadają się, żeby miały wyjść w ogóle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037920209', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1206, 'playtime_forever': 657, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 657, 'last_played': 1661343186}
review:
[h1]A decent title. [/h1]
The first episode of [b]Shadows on the Vatican[/b] does not bears the signs of uniqueness, which were to bring a breath of freshness to the genre of point and click. However, Act I: Greed gives us a few hours of solid and pleasant entertainment. The observed defects are not so serious to want to prematurely remove the game from the disk or regret devoted to the completion time. The initial section in the successful style of Roman opens investigation into James Murphy, laying the foundation for a delicious whole. So if you like the novel by Dan Brown and other such stories, give a chance to the project by Italian developers. Really worth. Of course, provided that you do not set up on something revolutionary.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132960300', 'num_games_owned': 1596, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1437905212}
review:
A normal Point&Click game, with a few puzzles (none of which are difficult), & an interesting story.

The story (no spoilers) was pretty good, & kept me interested the whole way through. 6/10.
The graphics were watchable & fine, but i believe below average. 4/10.
The sound was good, maybe even the 2nd best thing in the game, behind story. 6/10.

Overall, i really liked playing Shadows on the Vatican. I found the story to be quite solid, & i was into it almost straight away. It was very short (it took me 3hrs), but it was only Episode 1, so it's kind of like an intro to the story & characters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120732191', 'num_games_owned': 315, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1423250110}
review: Приехавший из Чикаго в Рим бывший священник, а ныне работающий врачом, главный герой Джеймс Мёрфи (James Murphy), отвечает на таинственный призыв о помощи своего друга Кристофоро (Cristoforo). Исчезновение портфеля с компрометирующими документами друга стало достаточным аргументом, чтобы вовлечь Джеймса в эту таинственную историю. Джеймса ждёт опасное приключение, неожиданные попутчики, которые поставят под сомнение даже самые твёрдые убеждения. В игре Вам предстоит исследовать Рим. Город предстанет в необычном виде: тёмный, с небом цвета крови, пролитой за 30 лет интриг: кровь виновных и невиновных, известных и неизвестных жертв...

author: {'steamid': '76561198074672646', 'num_games_owned': 6653, 'num_reviews': 596, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1435529041}
review:
[h1]Shadows on the Vatican Acte I : Avarice est un jeu d’aventure autour du Vatican et de la religion catholique[/h1]


Ce jeu d’aventure est surement bon, mais, personnellement, je n’aime pas du tout.

Quand je regarde ce jeu, j’ai l’impression que la religion catholique a une importance énorme dans le société italienne. En France, avec la révolution de 1789, les prêtres ont été torturés, guillotinés, tués et remis à leur place. L’Eglise s’occupe du spirituel et c’est tout. En Italie, l’Eglise a une place plus grande, trop grande et c’est ce que je n’aime pas.

Bon, je vous l’accorde, je serais encore plus mal à l’aise dans tous les pays où ce sont des religieux qui gouvernent, mais, là n’est pas la question.

Donc, je n’aime pas ce jeu.

Mais, si pour vous, cela n’a pas d’importance, et bien, vous allez trouver ce jeu surement très bien surtout qu’il semble composé de 3 parties.

D’ailleurs, ça me fait penser à « Seven » un film sur un tueur en série autour des 7 péchés capitaux.

Acheter ou pas acheter ? Moi, je regrette de l’avoir acheté, pour vous, c’est à vous de voir ...

[url=www.graal.fr/2015/06/30/test-shadows-on-the-vatican-la-version-pour-steam/]Pour découvrir toutes mes impressions sur Shadows on the Vatican Acte I : Avarice.[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198034592318', 'num_games_owned': 2139, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1437406656}
review:
Not the best game I have played, but I got interested in it while playing. Honestly I was like.. ohh adventure, lets farm cards and play for a while... but somethig pushed me further through the story even after all the cards dropped. I liked it and  will try the second act. 

On the other hand I have to say that animations are sometimes annoying and poorly done,. I was nervous while looking at screen few seconds after every dialogue, while the characters just stood there and looked not clever at all. it has even some bugs... I had a duplicate of drape on the candle snuffer until the end of the game although I returned the drape as I had to...

But as you can see I recommend it, and I will play it again soon to hunt the few achievments I missed :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198127245908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1431626424}
review:
Отличусь оригинальностью, и не буду писать про черный экран. Напишу-ка я лучше про игру.
Игра представляет из себя такой некий "квест", (ищем предметы, а потом думаем куда их пристроить), разбавляемый огромным количеством диалогов.
К тому же, работающим русским языком для этой игры разработчики обделили. Игра слишком короткая. Диалогов много. Сюжет пресный... 
В общем игра посредственная, но я сделаю скидку на то, что это выходец из Greenlight, а значит разработчики не многомиллиардная корпорация, а возможно только начинающие художники и программисты.
Так зачем я в нее вообще играл, да еще и ринулся писать рецензию, спросите вы? Да потому, что один ощутимый плюс у этой игры все же есть. Нет, не карточки.
Эта игра отлично сгодится как очередная "идеальная" игра в стиме. Определенный слой игроков, (к коим я себя так же отношу), меня поймет.
Достижений не много, зарабатываются они легко и довольно приятно. В процессе можно немного пораскинуть мозгами, понапрягать свое левое полушарие, отвечающее за логику и просто отдохнуть от шутеров. Я тут на досуге написал руководство - приятного прохождения и больше идеальных игр вам в стиме.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028134305', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1435422416}
review:
[b]*Act 1 has plenty of room for improvement; it provided me just enough build up and introduction to the story. Experienced point-and-click adventurers might not get enough satisfaction from this act. *[/b]

[h1]Story[/h1]
‘Shadows on the Vatican’ is a four-part episodic point-and-click adventure series. In its first act, Greed, you are taken back to 1996 when the protagonist, a priest of the Roman Catholic church named James Murphy, witnesses the murder of his mentor - Vatican priest named Dellerio - during a mission in Africa; which is told via reasonably looking comic-like cut scenes. James abandons his priesthood and moves from Italy back to his hometown of Chicago, where he becomes a doctor instead. Fourteen years later, James’ receives an invitation to return to Rome at the request of his friend Cristoforo, who promises to have more information on what really happened in Africa. 

[h1]Voice-Acting[/h1]
The story initiates an investigation into a deadly conspiracy that spans continents and decades and perhaps involves some influential members of the Catholic Church.
The game, which was originally released back in 2012 in Italy, is now for sale on Steam. Act 1 is fully voice acted, but most of it is not very good. The voice acting is very hit or miss since several important characters sound American - not taking James into account - while the story takes place in the middle of Rome. 

[h1]Visual Style[/h1]
Another disappointing aspect is the extremely visually dated 3D character models. Moreover they do not feel the same as the rest of the game. Greed‘s cut-scenes, menus, maps, character portraits, and inventory items are all hand-drawn - some better than others – but somehow the developers 10th Art Studio and Adventure Productions decided to go with 3D character models and environments instead. Even the free HD-version of the game, which comes with the standard edition after purchase on Steam, does not make these models look even remotely acceptable. 

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Regarding the gameplay of this linear and simple build-up adventure, one can luckily be more positive. The developers have used the Wintermute Engine. The same engine that was used in similar games and results in a technically solid game because the engine has already been widely tested.
As one can expect from a mouse-driven game James can be moved around by clicking where you want him to go and you click on objects and people to interact with them, using the left and right mouse button each with its specific function. As seems common with modern point and click games, you can press the spacebar to show all the hotspots in the current scene for a few seconds. Moreover, the 'M' key should bring up the map of Rome, but this did not always work. Luckily many of the exits during scenes lead directly to the map.
Also the well-designed interface of the inventory makes it easy to collect, combine items and navigate. 

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
With an interesting cliffhanger as an ending of the first act, I’m curious to see what roles the different characters play in the story and how the mystery of the Vatican unfolds further. Act 1 has plenty of room for improvement; it provided me just enough build up and introduction to the story, in order to wait for the other episodes. However, experienced point-and-click players might not get enough satisfaction from this act. 
That being said, the game was initially published in 2012 and the second act is still not available on Steam. Developers claim they are fixing issues and adding extra features for the Steam-version, but multiple release dates have not been met, while “the latest deadline” was actually March 2015.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130932508', 'num_games_owned': 1226, 'num_reviews': 724, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1435389210}
review:
[h1]Тени над Ватиканом[/h1]

Начну с того, что у меня не было никакого черного экрана. Потому придется написать обзор не о нем, а об игре. Это стандартная игра в жанре "Квест" типа "Найди то, собери это, используй там то" или Point & Click. В принципе таких игр тысячи и Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed ничем особым не выделяется. Простая игра на 2 часа и на 1 раз.

[h1]Плюсы и минусы:[/h1]

[u]Плюсы:[/u]
⋆ Достижения и карточки. Знаете, для меня это оказался главный плюс, ибо игра оказалась не такой уж и затягивающей. Зато пройдя ее можно остаться в плюсе от продаже карт и получить в стиме +1 идеальную игру (достижения очень легкие)
⋆ Русский язык. Да! У меня она запустилась на русском языке и без черного экрана =).
⋆ Музыка в главном меню. Очень понравилась. К игре это не относится, так что я просто упомянул об этом.
⋆ Графика

[u]Минусы:[/u]
⋆ Продолжительность. Игра очень короткая, всего на 2 часа.
⋆ Много диалогов. Даже слишком много.

[u]Плюс/минус:[/u]
⋆ Сюжет. Вроде как новая история, но он пресноват (омрачает количество диалогов)

[h1]Вердикт:[/h1]

Игра, коих тысячи, и есть игры куда лучше "Теней над Ватиканом". Я рекомендую ее только тем, кто хочет получить +1 идеальную игру. Конечно, игра неплохая, я не говорю, что она плохая и ни в коем случае ее не надо брать, просто еще раз говорю - игра на один раз.
Ставлю Shadows on the Vatican Act I: Greed:
[u]6/10[/u]

С уважением, Aikiro, [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/steamorators] Ораторы Ste@m [/url]

[i]P.S. Спасибо IndieGala за подарок =)[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198005458610', 'num_games_owned': 488, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1435341058}
review:
Yaklaşık 2 saat sürüyor, seriler halinde çıkacakmış. Karakterimiz eski bir rahip ama artık bir doktor. Chicago' dan Roma' ya tatile gidiyor. Roma varıyor daha hoteline yerleşip soluklanmadan telefonu çalıyor arayan arkadaşı christıfano. Onla buluşmaya gidiyor ancak arkadaşı öldürülüyor. Biz de başlıyoruz bunu araştırmaya işin içinde Vatikan' lı rahipler falan da olduğunu keşfediyoruz 2 saatlik ilk bölümün içinde. Bölüm tanışacağımız bir bayan karakterle bitiyor. 
İlk bölüm olduğu için açıkcası pek bir şey anlamadım hikayeden ama oyun fena değil. Benim gibi Point and Click seven iseniz  beğenirsiniz. Yoksa uğraşmayın bu oyunla.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112696881', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1438649833}
review:
Mi opinion sobre este juego es algo que no cambiaria aunque me mostraran pruebas.
Me ha gustado la historia de este, encima puede ser algo complicado para algunas personas que no se les den bien los acertijos, como en mi caso.

Tiene una historia muy agradable, es buena y me intriga, incluso he buscado la segunda parte.
Soy una persona la cual normalmente no juega este tipo de videojuegos, pero ha sido una excepcion para mi.

Mi Laptop lo ha corrido sin problemas, se me ha apagado de vez en cuando jugando (Pero en realidad era porque mi Laptop se sobrecalentaba y no tiene un buen enfriador), incluso cabe decir que lo hacia cuando aun no guardaba la partida... Hahahaha.

Lo recomiendo bastante si eres una persona la cual le gusta resolver algunos misterios por asi decirlo, y tambien si te gusta romperte la cabeza haha.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151222668', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1435203472}
review:
This is my review of this game please note that I got this free from IndieGala.

Graphics: Beautiful, very nice HD graphics for a game like this. I was very impressed. 8/10

Gameplay: Click and touch. Requires intelligence and logic to keep playing. The plot was not as boring as other people said so, it was interesting for me to continue playing. However I had to refer to YouTube for walkthrough hints when I got stuck a couple of times because this game has no hints-you have to try all the possiblities like mix and matching the differnent items in your inventory with one another and also with the environment. Dialogue wise voice acting was superb for a game like this but some conversations are rather obnoxious and I had to skip it. 5.5/10

Thats all for this review I rate it 6.7/10. Worth buying when on sale. I learnt a lot on Italian history and their language when playing this. This game is based in Rome.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198009884241', 'num_games_owned': 364, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1433768203}
review:
Первый эпизод приключенческого квеста "Shadows on the Vatican" знакомит нас с главным героем(бывшим священником), которому предстоит попытаться раскрыть "зловещую" тайну.

Основные особенности:
[list]
[*]Неплохая завязка сюжета
[*]Красиво нарисованные заставки
[*]Интересные персонажи и локации
[*]Проработанные диалоги
[*]"Страшненькая" анимация(это минус, но малозначительный для квестов)
[/list]

Довольно качественная игра, поэтому всем любителям игр подобного жанра рекомендуется к ознакомлению.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025788133', 'num_games_owned': 647, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1433622249}
review:
For a guy who doesn't play many Point & Click games, this game really took me by surprise. I found that the game was quite fresh for a person like me, who prefers a good Strategy over P&C adventure games. The game puts you, James, into a puzzle filled quest as you strive to find out clues as to why your coma induced friend is leaving you clues. 

This game is easy to complete, I did it in roughly 1.5 hours. So for a short space of time, it is an excellent time killer, also the game was free anyway, so for a free game it isn't that bad in all honesty. The only negative aspect of this game is that the character walks too slow, but then again, that is tradition with Adventure games such as Monkey Island & Broken Sword. 

Overall, 8/10, no Catholic Priests touched me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104350057', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1433016971}
review:
I got stucked very quickly. Why can't I get the keys???

Anyway, it is a game I will only play if my book of Harry Potter is more boring then Rupert.

At least I got my cards very quickly. That's a pro.

Graphics are boring, the sound (backgroundmusic) is good. Voices, well some are ok. BUT if I would meet that nun in real life, I def would run away. I can NOT stand that voice.

It is a point and click game, I was hoping it was more fun, and less confusing. HOW DO I GET THOSE DAMNED KEYS?!?!?!
BUT even if I am able to get the keys from the nun, I probably prefer to read my Harry Twatter book. I think I might throw this game away in my recycle bin, at least it saves me some space on my harddrive.

4/10, if you get this game as a gift, give it back please.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970716039', 'num_games_owned': 872, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1432460715}
review:
Titolo controverso.
Nonostante le stanze siano ben fatte e strutturate, i personaggi discretamente caratterizzati e la storia abbastanza coinvolgente, il gioco risulta molto limitato.
Le interazioni con l'ambiente e gli oggetti risulta ridotta ai minimi termini, il doppiaggio è stato preso troppo sotto gamba e la longevità non raggiunge la sufficienza (va bene, è solo un capitolo della serie ma sarebbe stato preferibile un gioco completo). A peggiorare la situazione si aggiunge la violazione di almeno 2 delle 10 regole di Gilbert (che non sono la bibbia, ma i 10 comandamenti).

Insomma: enormi potenzialità sfruttate enormemente male.

Da appassionato del genere non mi sento di consigliarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154757644', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1431903473}
review:
Interesting while it lasts...

This is a very short prologue of an adventure. The three and a half hours it took me to complete it served to build up a tense atmosphere that began to draw me into the plot. Sadly however, it ended abruptly and very frustratingly, with nothing resolved.

I am not sure about these episodic adventures. On the one hand, it is understandable that developers need to release titles in parts as they need the finance to finish off the game, but on the other hand it can be very frustrating for the player that enjoys the full works. I guess this has to do with the generally low price of retail nowadays, compared to, say 15 - 20 years ago when full, long games cost at least 10 times as much. So it's not surprising short episodic chunks are being brought to us.

The graphics are good and easily serve the purpose, creating a solid atmosphere. The dialogue and voice work is very well done. The main character is particularly well-voiced. The puzzles are mostly very easy as everything points the player in the right direction. The only time I had any length of difficulty (and it wasn't very long) was in a pixel puzzle where something needed to be picked up to move the story along.

I notice that the second episode came out two years after this one. There are supposed to be 4 episodes in all, so it looks like this game won't be concluded for another 4 years, if the developers keep at it. Thus, I'm going to sit it out and wait for the rest to be released before I play anymore.

review: I really enjoyed this game. The art style is pretty cool the story has some plot twists and i'll be honest the length of the game is some what of an issue for me its only around 3 hours. But for 7 dollars I really can't complain my only wish is that the rest of the saga "Shadows on the Vatican" gets greenlit because im curious on how the story continues to unfold. I'll be honest some of the puzzles in the game I wasn't sure about it could be I wasn't paying much attention or the information wasn't there but I did have to look up a guide for certain sections of this game. Overall I would recommend this game to anyone who likes stories about corruption and puzzle games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008882298', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1428594006}
review: Сам жанр "piont and click" достаточно интересен если разрабы пихнули в это тесто много интересного изюма. Игра сделана по супер пупер бестселлеру Девида Яллопа "Во имя Господа". Наверняка половина из нас его прочитала,а вторая перечитывает. Сама тема Ватикана она довольно скучная для массового потребителя,ну а для нас христиан,так еще и малознакомая. Так что игра собирает весь изюм в виде тайн,интриг и расследования,но попадает в Ямало-Ненецкий округ,где изюм просто не едят так как никто не знает,что это такое.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063824563', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1427990399}
review: Игра прекрасна но проходится слишком быстро,модельки и анимации иногда бывает,режут глаз,но не так критично,чтобы нельзя было играть.К сожалению смотря на информация на офф сайте,разработчики забросили другие акты.Для жителей  России могу сказать,что живу в Европе,но поставил русский язык и не испытываю никаких проблем.Попробуйте поставить совместимость exe файла с Windows XP Service Pack 3 и запускать от имени администратора.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101362468', 'num_games_owned': 438, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 285, 'last_played': 1428156523}
review:
通关2个多小时，全成就4个多小时

差评，理由如下：
1.首先这个游戏的很多设计不合理，被作者强制规定了很多流程。比如朋友的笔记在与修女对话以前没有意义，比如看到修女喝酒还不能直接给她酒瓶，需要先点一下空瓶才可以。我只想说这谁能想得到。而且你真要我点敢不敢把空瓶放在显眼点的地方。这使得很多地方不得不去看攻略，严重破坏游戏体验
2.其次，男主走的太慢了
太……慢……了……
不论到哪去，他就那么【慢……悠……悠……】地走
你妹啊！跑两步会死啊！那么紧张的时候你还这么【慢……悠……悠……】你还想不想调查了？？
包括里面的其他人也都是【慢……悠……悠……】的，在他们走完以前你什么都做不了
3.里面那个追踪的小游戏没有任何意义，不考校你的任何能力，就是看你猜的准不准，完全不知道为什么会有那么一个东西存在，这让我一下子觉得这游戏更烂了
4.隐藏那一关的视角简直马勒戈壁了，我一直以为镜头前面的是主角，结果尼玛原来是很远的看不到的那个才是主角啊卧槽

唯一的好评是献给AVGCHINA汉化组的，尽管他们的汉化不能解锁成就，但是也让我不用费力去看英语了

author: {'steamid': '76561198141179402', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1427974307}
review:
Как много шуток  про черный экран ,как мало обзоров, рассказывающих про саму игру.Постараюсь исправить эту ситуацию.
Получив игру на раздаче от Indiegala, я,п очему-то, в тот же день запустил ее.Ватикан в названии заставил меня подумать, что в игре под видом адвенчуры  будут представлены суровые будни пресвитера Римско-католической церкви.Ан нет, видимо, я ошибался, когда думал, что поклонники Дэна Брауна перестали терзать мироздание своими творениями.
Как итог-сюжет повествует нам об очередном заговоре  [strike]жидо-масонов [/strike]                                                      кардиналов и римских мобстеров.
Друг ГГ оставляет ему ключ в книге, который открывает тайник, в котором билеты в зоопарк, где живет бегомотиха Мамба, в прямой кишке  которой тысячу лет назад спрятали доказательства существования Бога.Утрирую, конечно, но даже описанный мною вариант был бы поинтереснее предложенного разработчиками.

Также, налицо все классические болезни жанра-нелогичные задачки (знаете,что делать,если повисли на краю стропил и боитесь навернуться?Нужно уцепиться с помощью...СВЯЗКИ КЛЮЧЕЙ!).ГГ тащит в карман все,что плохо привинчено (нашел скальпель в аптечке?Знай-пролежит всю игру в инвентаре без применения).
Разработчики не очень потрудились над сюжетом и задниками ,зато арты-комиксы получились неплохо.Озвучка скорее негодная.Зато есть русский язык (правда,в некоторых местах перевод попахивает промтом).Ну и анимация уровня первого Half-Life не помогает погружению в атмосферу (хотя в титрах игры значатся актеры Motion-Capture!)
Но я,конечно,готов сделать проекту скидку (начинающие разработчики,Greenlight, все дела), и поставить положительную оценку.Учитывая,что игра досталась мне по цене дырки от бублика, я остался вполне удовлетворен.Ведь еще   есть карточки, а 100% ачивментов достигаются очень легко!Однако,покупать ее за полную цену я ни в коем случае не советую.Красная цена -рублей 40.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022458781', 'num_games_owned': 2808, 'num_reviews': 206, 'playtime_forever': 657, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 657, 'last_played': 1427559033}
review:
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/40165899]Curatore in lingua italiana[/url]

Shadows of the Vatican è una avventura in terza persona pianificata originariamente per far parte di una serie, di cui sarebbe stata la capostipite: attualmente però ne sono state pubblicate in totale solo due. Vediamo un po' di caratteristiche. Gli ambienti ed i personaggi sono ben resi graficamente, anche se non ci sono primi piani ed animazioni facciali; inoltre noto un numero non sufficiente di frame di animazione. Molto suggestive le scene di intermezzo, nelle quali la grafica muta di punto in bianco verso soluzioni di tipo disegno fumettistico. Il sonoro è buono, ed è interessante che la colonna sonora di sottofondo del menu, di sapore corale sacro medioevale, venga invece ripresentata nei titoli di coda in versione più moderna e decisamente rock.  La trama è tinta di sfumature noir, feroce, che non lesina crude scene di assassinio. Le voci sono di qualità ed inquadrate nella parte. Gli enigmi non sono affatto facili. Dal mio punto di vista personale esprimo un vivo apprezzamento del fatto che, dopo tutte quelle adventure americane, inglesi, francesi, ecc., ce ne sia una finalmente ambientata nel Bel Paese, e che in essa si respiri finalmente l'aria di casa nostra, con personaggi squisitamente nostrani e con una città di Roma che, come palcoscenico di storie e personaggi, oltre che per altri aspetti, nulla ha da invidiare a quella di New York, Parigi o Londra (senza nulla togliere alla qualità delle avventure straniere, sia chiaro). La cosa che invece mi ha dato più fastidio è che, mentre mi sembrava che si entrasse nel vivo del gioco, esso invece termina: in un Gabriel Knight Sin of the Fathers , per es., le battute di gioco di SotV avrebbero coperto solo il primo giorno..  Ma d'altronde dalla pubblicità del gioco si evince la brevità del gioco, ed inoltre il suo prezzo di copertina non è elevato, vista anche la sua qualità. Un altro neo è che sia i caricamenti che i salvataggi non mi sembrano proprio veloci. In definitiva consiglio questo gioco.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015945093', 'num_games_owned': 1831, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1426777716}
review:
Pierwsza część czteroaktowej opowieści [i]Shadows on the Vatican[/i] nie porywa, choć ma swoje dobre momenty. Wcielając się w byłego księdza, James Murpchy'ego, podążamy po śladach, które zostawił jego najlepszy przyjaciel i próbujemy odkryć niechlubną tajemnicę Watykanu. A w tę zamieszane są: kościół, bank, a nawet włoska mafia! 
Grze możemy zarzucić, że jest brzydka, krótka, prosta, a momentami nawet prostacka i nielogiczna (zagadki). Jednak historia, którą opowiada jest jak dobry kryminał i sprawia, że trudno się od niej oderwać. Właśnie ze względu na świetny klimat i dobrą fabułę warto sięgnąć po ten tytuł... pod warunkiem, że dorwiemy ją na jakiejś wyprzedaży.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130262111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 261, 'playtime_forever': 256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1590083959}
review:
El juego esta muy bien, es una aventura grafica muy entretenida. Me recuerda a la saga Broken Sword. Lo unico que hecho en falta, es que sea un poco mas larga la aventura y que este doblado al castellano, pero al menos esta traducido.
El precio me parecio un poco excesivo, ademas, me hubiese gustado haber tenido que comprar el juego en Gog o Fx Interactive, haber si lo sacan para esas tiendaa interactivas.
Si te gustan las aventuras graficas, este juego sin duda es de los tuyos.
Espero que pronto saquen la segunda entrega en Steam y no se hagan de rogar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042831386', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 627, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1422885131}
review:
[h1]Short version: 77%[/h1]
Shadows on the Vatican is a typical European thriller in an adventure game format. With a good plot, acceptable dialogues and painful English voice acting. If this wouldn’t be only the first quarter of a seemingly defunct miniseries, I would wholeheartedly recommend it for anyone.

[h1]Long version:[/h1]
As the title suggests, Shadows on the Vatican – Act I: Greed is the first part of a point ‘n’ click adventure game miniseries. That, surprisingly, was made by Italians.
Surprisingly, since the plot– a thriller set around a financial crime–, the characters, and the art style all point to French bande dessineés (comic albums, where these kinds of stories are quite frequent), not Italian fumettis.

Not that it matters, since what we get is a solid work, although not without flaws. For example the English voiceover is barely tolerable at best. Also, since this is only a quarter of a story, it is quite short and doesn’t answer any questions, only sets up further episodes. And those may never be published at all: when this review was written, only Act II was available from the publisher’s web site.

Still, if you don’t mind watching only the beginning of a thriller and have 2-3 spare hours, this game is an enjoyable way to pass the time.
